title: Mech Arena: Robot Showdown
description:
üõ°Ô∏è Mech Arena: Robot Showdown is a FREE competitive multiplayer robot game with deep gameplay, intense team battles, and lush 3D graphics.

With levels designed for tight, fast PvP gameplay, battles take about five minutes. During a battle, you‚Äôll spend every moment with guns blazing. Real-time 5 vs 5 big bad robot combat never looked this good!

Choose from dozens of weapons and war robots with special abilities for endless battle combinations, then customize them for each new war. Meet friends and form teams to dictate the tides of war in exciting Control Point Capture matches or brutal Team Deathmatch battles.

Like taking the high ground? Back up your team with a sniper mech. Want to get up close and personal? Pick a Mech armed with autocannons, respawn, and jump back in the action. With instant live matchmaking, you go from pocket to live battle in this robot game in less than 30 seconds!

Fight your friends, crush global Tournaments, customize everything, and carve out your legend as the baddest pilot in Mech Arena: Robot Showdown. Be a smart shooter... the world is watching!

‚ãáEXCITING ROBOT GAME FEATURES‚ãá

REAL-TIME 5v5 PvP BATTLES

Test your skill against real players from around the world in live mech wars. Team up with your friends and conquer the rankings together as your robots battle for glory!

COMPETITIVE GAMEPLAY

With rankings and achievements, there are tons of ways to win prizes for your war bots. When you‚Äôre ready, join Tournaments to prove your worth in all-out PvP mech wars. Rise up the divisions, pick up gear, and strike fear.

POINT AND SHOOT SIMPLICITY

Intuitive controls make it easy to get the hang of your war robots even in your first PvP battle. Want to play it your way? Customize controls so your war bots fit your needs. Then, go out there and dominate the mech wars!

ENDLESS CHOICES

Are you a scout? Sniper? Shooter that just runs in, guns blazing? In this robot game,  there‚Äôs always a mech loadout that‚Äôs perfect for you. Apply unique skins or add paint jobs to make your war robots stand out.

FUN TEAM-BASED BATTLES

Get your friends together, plan your team strategies, design compatible war bots, and fight in mech wars side-by-side. Bring in allies from Facebook or find new ones on the battlefield. Mech Arena: Robot Showdown is like a LAN party in your pocket!

UNIQUE GAME MAPS

Fight up close in the Mech Arena. Run PvP missions at the Mesa Verde facility, or watch robots battle among the stars at Elon Station Gray. Shoot down enemy war bots under the neon lights of the Forbidden City, or fight through frosty Patterson Station. In this robot game, the world and beyond is your arena.

TONS OF WEAPONS

Attack from cover with long-range artillery, shoot around corners with smart missiles, freeze war bots with stasis guns, or rely on good old kinetic and energy weapons. Your robots battle with them all. They‚Äôre all upgradeable, so go nuts.

SPECIAL MECH ABILITIES

Blind your opponents with targeting jammers. Shoot your war robots forward at ramming speed. Deploy energy shields, jump jets, mines, and more. Every map is different - find the right mix for your style of battle.

NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM

Mech Arena: Robot Showdown is a shooter designed to work on most 4G/LTE networks. So, you can fight mech wars and watch your robots battle wherever you can get away with it.

NOTE:

‚Ä¢ Items can be purchased in Mech Arena: Robot Showdown. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type.
‚Ä¢ Mech Arena is available in English, French, German, Italian, Chinese (Simplified), Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazilian), Russian, Spanish and Turkish.

Mech Arena: Robot Showdown Support: arena.support@plarium.com
Mech Arena: Robot Showdown Community: https://plarium.com/forum/en/mech-arena/
Privacy Policy: https://plarium.com/en/legal/privacy-and-cookie-policy/
Privacy Request: https://plarium-dsr.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new 
Terms of Use: https://plarium.com/en/legal/terms-of-use/

comments: I love the game, it's fun, action packed, but I feel it needs the following: 1) the game needs some adjustments to make the game play fair. In a match an opponent was eliminating me in 3 sec with a lazer weapon. 2) could you make hiting certain areas on a robot deal more damage, for example, hitting the drivers cabin and back armor of the robot will deal more damage than aiming for the front armor. This will add more strategy. Other than that, it's a great game and I highly recommend it!

Game is good overall. Just encountering problems on two fronts; Firstly, the teammates that we are assigned automatically are mostly not exactly at our level or the level of our opponents and it is very problematic for us. Secondly, I know you guys have to earn money somehow. But it shouldnt be as hard to earn credits as it is. It is ver very very hard to get even a decent amount of credits no matter how much I play. So please please please atleast fix this problem if not both. Thanks a lot!

THIS GAME IS SO AWESOME!!!!! I now have the panther and it is one tough nugget! I absolutely love everything about this game. My strategy is to first use the Paragon at a battle and when I die, I spawn with the Panther and I always win with that strategy. Congratulations to the developer. I'm already becoming a pro at this game! Again congrats for the development of this amazing game. The graphics and game play is so smooth. Along with the awesome mechanics of this game.I love it!. Cool BTW

Hands down one of the best, if not, the best mecha game out there for mobile. Great control, amazing graphic, and surprisingly smooth performance even on a potato device. Just few suggestions to make this game even better: 1. Please increase the credit reward after each match, so we can progress much better. 2. Please add full-controller support. With this kind of graphic, it's a shame to not being able to play with controller. Please consider my suggestion, because I really love this game.

I like the game and all. The Mechs are cool. You can upgrade right away. I mean I started playing today and I have 2 Mechs and 5 or so guns. But you can't join battles in play. And message friends. You gotta wait till division 9. And sometime the game glitches.Well at least for me. I waited 10 minutes and it said it couldn't find any players. But other then that the game is cool. I have said everything needed.

title: My Friend Pedro
description:
They kidnapped his wife and kids and left him for dead. But it's going to take more than that to split this banana's family. Help your friend Pedro serve some ice cold revenge, with a sprinkle of bullets on top!

My Friend Pedro is back in a brand new mobile adventure of blood, bullets and bananas! Flip and fire your way through 37 action packed levels on foot, on a motorcycle and even on a skateboard. Plan your high caliber choreography for the best scores and, if your skin is tough enough, test your skills in Blood Rush mode.

This banana is Ripe for Revenge. Are you?

recentChanges: Thanks for your valuable feedback! This update is ad supported and allows players to play the whole game for free and restart from checkpoints. Premium Unlock is still available for an ad free experience and additional Blood Rush game mode. Have fun and please leave us a review!
comments: It's a really fun game. The controls are good, the combat flow is on fleek, and the story is pretty good! My only problem is how fast the game is. I mean sure, it's a phone game, phone games are meant to be simplistic games you play on your toilet, but even Angry Birds (which is a pretty simple game) is longer than this! I beat this in 2 days! And if I want more game, I gotta pay for it! Besides how short it is, this game is fun as hell. Five stars, 100% pog.

This game is just like my old days at Y8. It feels like I'm on a speedrun while playing this game coz I finished it under 30 minutes with 3 stars in each level, I'll keep on supporting this game. This is easy on regular mode however I don't want to spend any money purchasing the premium, so please add harder levels on the next update. Every game deserves a 5 star rating and a positive review so the developers can push forward and make the game better than it was before. Good job Developers.

The only thing that went up is the graphics quality in which I still dont like the style. You cannot walk, or slow the perception of time when you want to like in the original game. I downloaded this game for a remake of a game I used to play all the time and got something completely different. Really the change in mechanics and controls was the biggest part for me. Either add a few more buttons or call it something else. Overall it's not terrible but I'm not a fan

Great game and I totally appreciate the whole mobile re-design from the original, however, I really didn't like the control scheme... the "drag and release" input method simply kills the whole rythme of the game, i don't understand why the game doesn't have a simple virtual joystick on the left to control direction, and an A/B buttons on the right to Jump/Slide, and the shooting can remain the same (tap anywhere in the screen to shoot toward that direction). This was the only reason stopping me from buying the premium cause the current control really made the game very uncomfortable to play, i hope you consider this, cheers!

To say I'm a fan of this would be an understatement, this game is sooo good on phones. It's such a fun game, it translates to mobile very well. Not only that, but the fact that this is a brand new experience instead of just a port really livens the experience. This is a must-get if you're a fan of the 2019 My Friend Pedro and/or it's flash game origins.

title: FNF Draw Music Battle
description:
‚úçÔ∏è FNF Draw Puzzle - Friday Night music draw puzzle is a very funny and creative game, you will experience the puzzles combined with extremely smart and challenging strokes. 

After finishing a progress in FNF Draw Night Funkin', this game will provide you with catchy music from various characters: Garcello, Boyfriend, Girlfriend, Daddy Dearest, Mommy Nearest, Monster Spirit, Skid and Pump, Pico, Tankman, and Whitty. In particular, incorporating music into the game enhances the experience, giving you a completely different feeling from current drawing games.

FEATURES:
‚úÖ Draw one part - DOP: only one single line accepted.
‚úÖ Cunning combination of logical puzzle, drawing games and music games.
‚úÖ Unexpected and humorous drawing will activate your imagination and creativity.
‚úÖ Battle music after finishing a progress
‚úÖ The AI programme helps guess the shape you draw so you can draw whatever you think that might work.

Download FNF Draw Puzzle  for free and enjoy training your brain with continuously upgrading challenges. Win this Friday Night music draw puzzle game and prove that you are smarter than the rest of the world!üî•

comments: You know how games are supposed to be good? And fun? Well. This is the other end of the spectrum. This game actually broke me. I swear, this guy interpolated the footage and now it looks janky and horrible. The audio is so bad. And the gameplay is just so bad, at one point your drawing an eye and the next, a full stage. I swear this game will hold Guinness for the most ads in one game. I hope anyone who's reading this pays attention to this review and does not play it or at least rates it 0*

I kept my expectations very low but somehow this app couldnt even beat that. The app was overall very laggy and some of the levels they make it way too obvious and then others they give you almost nothing on figuring out what you have to draw so you just left to hints which don't work. Also the pencil likes to go crazy. Just find something else don't bother.
This is for four year olds and its so annoying that they are getting ads which is money for what they do for nothing
This game is garbage, I don't even have to draw it right and I still get it correct, the beats are out of sync and it's just overall bad.
If I could of set 0 stars I would ads are every were this game sux I could draw a line for every thing I think you should not play this

title: PAW Patrol Rescue World
description:
Explore Adventure Bay like never before in PAW Patrol‚Ñ¢ Rescue World!  
SAFE & EASY fun game play for kids from their favorite show! Whenever there‚Äôs trouble, just yelp for help! 

Fun games designed for boys & girls in Pre school & Kindergarten! No job is too big, no pup is too small!

PLAY WITH YOUR FAVORITE PUPS ‚Äì The Pups are ready to go! Ride around Adventure Bay with Chase, Skye and Marshall (More pups added soon!). Each pup has a special skill and vehicle for all your rescue needs. 

EXPLORE & PLAY ‚Äì There's a ton of things to see and do all throughout Adventure Bay! You're free to explore. The more you play the game, the more things you'll unlock in each area!

HERO MISSIONS ‚Äì PAW Patrol‚Ñ¢ to the lookout! Choose the Pup that is best for your mission and help save the day. 

RESCUE ‚Äì Help the people of Adventure Bay and win fun rewards for your Pups.

PUP TREATS ‚Äì Each mission you complete will earn a reward! Find hidden treats around town!

SAFE & KID FRIENDLY  - Kids games designed for pre school, kindergarten, elementary school boys & girls. Educational, engaging and fun games for kids to explore from their favorite TV, YouTube Kids & Netflix show! Easy game play to learn, for young children and toddlers aged 3-6. Parents and other family members can play along too! 

IN APP PURCHASES

comments: Follow up post- After having to continue to go out of site and re-enter after ads popped up 6/7 times, I decided to just play high as I could to get rid of the coins and uninstall the game. I do not mind the ads, as most sites send you back to your game, but this site keep you hostage on the ad page as if to make you download it. It is a terrible glitch because all the games are great, the ads making you exit out is really terrible.

I understand that there will be ads, and I would have given a higher star but the ads have really become a problem. Everytime I am in a bonus round an ad pops up and I can't get back to the game and I have to close it entirely and reopen everything. This happens contantly. I am getting really tired of having to close the casino and reopen it because of the ads. Maybe you can fix your games so we can get back from the ad without closing the game completely. I may uninstall because of this.
Legitimately a fun slots game. Easy to come back of you lost all your coins. Haven't felt the need to spend real money but you never know. I may be tempted to down the road.

Ridiculous with the ads ever since the upgrade a few days ago. About every 2 to 3 minutes, and ad... I should not have to make a purchase to play a game without being constantly interrupted by ads. I understand that is how you make money but why so greedy?? Going into the closet here why an ad literally every like 2 minutes? And it interrupts gameplay even...
The graphics in the winds are pretty good but the advertisement said that you would get free spins every 15 spins, but that's not the truth but still enjoying the game, worth the time

title: Magnum Quest
description:
An Imaginative IDLE RPG. Become a wise and powerful master, an amazing Hands-free adventure for you. Easy to play, Fun to win! 
Start a great adventure in this visually-stunning 3D RPG strategy game and have fun with players from all around the world.

Game Features

[Outstanding 3D Graphics] 
Exquisite 3D scenes, detailed character models and cool special effect skills. Get frozen in the BOSSES storm, touch the flames of the dungeon dragons and experience an immersive visual feast.

[Summon Legendary Heroes]
Collect legendary heroes from six factions: Fortress,Forest, Wild, Shadow, Divine and Abyss. Master factional attributes and counter strategies, build the strongest 5-player team to dominate Armuda continent! 

[Form Strategic Skills]
Shield, taunt, leech, freeze, repel, stun...Each hero possesses unique skills. Strategies and skills will let you win unexpected victories, apply wisdom and you will never be bored of this game.

[Explore Imaginative Worlds]
Armuda continent is a world full of imaginations, lead your heroes to fight in fantasy forests and endless deserts, explore mysterious ruins and frozen snowfields.

comments: Every other game where you just watch the battles I give 1 star. So for this to get 3 stars shows just how good the graphics, UI and overall presentation is. So that said, I've never been more mad at a game. This game looks so good and is smooth to operate yet you do nothing really. You spend your time leveling up heroes just to then watch them fight. I play games to actually play them. If I wanted to watch I'd put on Netflix. Please please make there more to do in battles. It's worth it!

Crispy graphics. I love the D&D tabletop setup of the game. I just enjoy the background view in this game. As far as gameplay, it's your standard heroes captcha games. Gather Heroes, level them up, gear them up and take on adventures, hunts, raids, arena and guilds. No bugs or any issues encountered yet. Pros to the Devs!

Absolutely loving this game. The combat system is similar to Summoners War: Lost Centuria, without the cheap counter attacks. There's plenty of heroes to collect, and a ton of team combinations. I've only been playing for about 8 hours, so I'm not too far into the game, but I can say for certain this game will stay on my phone.

Really enjoying this one!! Its kinda the same theme as "AFK-Arenas" but better grafix and character designs! There's a mass amount of goodies,/,rewards that are given everyday and always something to do to earn towards character development!! Thanks guys!! I'll be sticking around this one for awhile!!

It's a really good clone of the other games of the same genre. Graphics are good, gameplay is smooth, and the interface is awesome with the table-top DnD theme. You can F2P and they'll say that, but to really enjoy the game you'll need to pay, and it snowballs quick. So play with caution and be aware of the pay model and you'll have a good time.

title: Contra Returns
description:
Remember the secret code: Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, B, A to get extra lives? After a 30-year hiatus, the Contra you know and love is back! Developed by famous Japanese game company KONAMI and world-leading game developer TIMI, Contra Returns aims to bring the classic Contra experience to mobile platforms. 
In Contra Returns, players can enjoy the classic side-scrolling gameplay, two-person teams, alien bosses, and signature settings and soundtrack from the original series! All with updated HD resolution, 3D character models, and vivid acoustic and visual effects to deliver a sensory experience like no other! Get your fighting spirit all fired up with innovative content: real-time PvP battles, unique heroes, companions, and team mode! Legendary heroes Bill and Lance are making a comeback, so let's kick some alien butt and save the world!

„ÄêSpecial Features„Äë 

Reignite the Battlefield:  Fight like a warrior in this worthy sequel to the classic Contra series made in collaboration with Konami.

Conquer the Battlefield with Friends:  Team up online, test your teamwork skills, and take on the Contra world together.

Go Head-to-Head in Real-Time Combat:  With fair competition and 3-second matching, enjoy exciting multiplayer battles online.

Tons of Gameplay:  Experience all-new gameplay in the Team, Challenge, Story, and PvP modes.

Weapons Galore:  Mix and match your arsenal and pair up different heroes to unlock new skills!

Official website: https://www.contrareturnsm.com/
FacebookÔºöhttps://www.facebook.com/ContraReturnsOfficial/
DiscordÔºöhttps://discord.com/invite/TAx8kuXTxE

comments: I see my review was removed. The game is SUPER pay to win! Skill is not required and the whole game is a numbers game. Even if you had the skill and patience, a timer will make sure you fail. It's clear the devs wish to hide this as well with the removal of my review. The delay with the servers is awful, along with hit detection. You'll either get hit by something that didn't touch you, or you'll be hit by something that did touch you in .5-1.5+ seconds later. PvP is also massively unbalanced.

Great game and an awesome pass time. Leveling up is a breeze and upgrading weapons is simple and fair. PVP didn't take long to be taken over by hackers and whales, while some modes like one life mode is just broken. In One Life mode, you have to figure out how to get manual aim to work, otherwise the entire mode is riddled with poorly placed enemies that will hit you no matter what you do, because either their hit boxes are too large for their design, or because they appear out of nowhere.

Game is fun BUT the Story Mode progression is so heavily reliant on level requirements it ruins the desire to play after level 40. Basically it's a pay wall and if you want to play more you better cough up real life money. No, I won't, and when a game restricts things this ridiculously it's not worth investing in because it's just a matter of time before you have to pay and pay.

Terrible. Yes the controls are almost good enough, the graphics are pretty nice. BUT I WANT TO PLAY CONTRA. INSTEAD...I have to spend 30 minutes raiding previous levels so I can advance and PLAY another level, else I should pay for extra lvl'ing so my character is leveled enough TO PLAY THE NEXT LEVEL?!?! What?! So I blow through stages 1-3 never even get touched, but im 3 levels away from being allowed to play the next level? It's dumb. I want to play contra. This isn't contra.

This could have been good. There is controller support, I guess? But it stopped working after the tutorial level. I also can't support games with gacha mechanics. This doesn't feel like Contra. It feels like a poorly made mobile game with a license from Konami. The load times are also pretty atrocious. I was hoping for better, especially after Konami released Castlevania Symphony of the Night on Android. That game is great and exactly what I want more of, even if it's more expensive.

Rec Room is the best place to build and play games together. Party up with friends from all around the world to chat, hang out, explore MILLIONS of player-created rooms, or build something new and amazing to share with us all.

Rec Room is free, and cross plays on everything from phones to VR headsets. It‚Äôs the social app you play like a video game!
 - Customize and dress up your cute Rec Room avatar to express your style
 - Discover challenging, fun or straight up weird games made by creators just like you
 - Try your skill with the Maker Pen, the tool used by Rec Room creators to build everything from puppies to helicopters to entire worlds!

comments: Have it on VR, console and mobile. It's my favourite game, and is a great way to make friends. There is a lot there for the art community and also people who enjoy the creative aspects such as making games. My only complaint is that the rec room community aren't pushed enough to make a variety of games, and lots of people only make ones they know are popular such as parkour and pvp's. Rec room needs to find a way to encourage more people to create a wider variety of games

This game is amazing! It's almost as good as vrchat! Very good work on this! Although..I do wish they added hair physics or shaders or just something to really improve recroom like maybe give the player's bodies so they can have more experience? But the hard thing is using the full body morphs. They're hard and complicated but still good!

I would give it 5 stars but the only thing I personally don't like is the new home, loading screen colors and background colors for items. I liked the purple color on the loading screen and I think on the background of items too. The new home is way to bright, it needs to be a bit darker. But overall a very good game. And maybe they should allow junior accounts to make worlds but maybe no be able to share or the game restricts the account to certain items that are inappropriate.

At first when the game first released on Android it was pretty buggy. Controls were off and it was just stuttering every minute. But now with some recent updates it's gotten a whole lot better. There are still some stutters but honestly those are also on the PS4 and Xbox versions of the game as well so I don't know if they can fix it. Paintball for example depending on the map used to be unplayable at times. Now it's pretty alright. Definitely playable on all maps now. It's a damn fine port.

The game is good so far. I wanna play it with my friends but it doesnt support their version. I suggest more graphics settings like frame rates and stuff because my fps awlays drops to 40 and Im sure that I can run this game stable 60 fps. Also have some control issues hope you can fix it. overall game is good it brings mobile to another level

title: Color Ball Adventure
description:
Are you ready to join a brand new adventure with our Color Ball? His best friends were kidnapped by the evil bosses and their supporters. Color Ball's mission is to go through the lands and defeat all the enemies and mighty bosses to rescue his friends.

All you need to do is help Color Ball avoid the obstacles, deathly traps, and fierce enemies who appear everywhere to stop our Color Ball from accomplishing his mission.


Behold because it's Color Red Ball to the rescue!


HOW TO PLAY

* Use the control to roll the ball and jump

* Get stars to open new worlds. Stars can be achieved by collecting coins, keys and killing enemies

* Collect keys to receive rewards and special levels

* Discover hidden lands in every level

GAME FEATURES

* Addictive and challenging gameplay with 100+ levels to master

* Different worlds themes with beautiful graphics to discover

* Various enemies and fierce bosses to defeat on your way to the final destination

* Physics-based platformer system

* Tons of gold coins to collect and become a Billionaire

* Worthy Daily and Free Gifts, Lucky Wheel that will support you to be the winner

You can save your progress by logging in with Facebook and join our Facebook Group to share your experience with global friends.

comments: While an obvious knock-off, this game is thoroughly enjoyable if you like the genre, even without paying a pence. I played through all 80 available levels in an evening (and paid for ad-free as thanks, finding the experience worth the few quid). I only gave four stars because the balancing for the level star-rating is a bit wacky, though. While I was able to get three stars without problems on 74 out of 80 levels (I'm used to these mx games), six levels have unrealistic or impossible time requirements for 3 stars. Most of the others were WAY to easy. Devs: you should review the difficult or impossible star requirements for the following levels: 48,53,63,64,77,78. In addition you might want to make many of the other ones more difficult as well.
If you have too many ads popping up then simply turn on airplane mode, and after your done with the game feel free to turn it off
Too many ads. I usually opt to pay to remove ads after playing it for a few days but after less than half an hour the game got removed.

I was really enjoying this until some crypto card ad came up. The ad was fine, but it locked up at a screen wanting me to launch the app store and download the app for it. Can't play the game if ads are locking me out.
This game and app sucks big ball sacks you can't get through one stage without a stupid add. Kick rocks and figure it out. GARBAGE!!!

title: Vlad and Niki - Math Academy
description:
Discover the most fun educational games to learn math with the most famous brothers Vlad and Niki!

With the different games of this app kids will be able to develop their math skills and through the missions they will be able to test everything they are learning. Vlad and Nikita, the children's favorite characters, are waiting for them to join the adventure of learning! Vlad and Niki - Math Academy games will help children learn to count numbers from 1 to 20, do calculations with addition and subtraction, learn geometric shapes and much more! 

Your children will develop their intelligence while having fun and you will be able to check their progress in math. The application offers a specific section with statistics and graphs so that parents or guardians can visualize the student's development, as well as identify mathematics content with points of improvement or with the highest number of errors. In this way, children can reinforce the areas where they encounter greater difficulty.

TYPE OF GAMES 

With fun math exercises organized in different categories, children will learn basic mathematical concepts such as:

- Counting numbers from 1 to 20
- Classify objects by shape, size and color
- Continuing series and sequences of elements
- Perform simple addition and subtraction calculations
- Identify objects by position 
- Compare items by weight
- Learn basic geometric shapes

FEATURES

- Vlad and Niki official application
- Fun mathematical quests and challenges
- Games to stimulate the brain
- Simple and intuitive interface
- Fun designs and animations
- Original sounds and voices of Vlad & Niki
- Free game

ABOUT VLAD & NIKI

Vlad and Niki are two brothers known for their videos about toys and stories from daily life. They have become one of the most important influencers among children, with millions of subscribers around the world.

In these games you will find your favorite characters to encourage you to solve the puzzles and smart challenges they propose. Have fun with them while stimulating your brain!

comments: These developers made most of the games we are playing now. Most of the advertisement is fake, they lie how you can cash out in minutes. Once you try to cash out, it's on reviews. Then you have to watch lots of ads 50 to 300 plus. Then you still have to spin a lot again. Sometimes for extra rolls of cash or gold bars. If you need 100 cash rolls, you will be stuck on 99 like I am stuck on 99 for over two weeks. I'm stuck on 29 gold bars, I need 30. I don't think that we will ever get the 30th one

I would say this was a fun game to play but I would be lying like the makers of this app. For one the ads are so ridiculous there's no way that you could even enjoy the game. I do reviews on Google just for this type of thing to let people know the apps that do make the money those are misplay just play current the music app. If you want to make some money go to those apps because these apps are all scams scum liars. And the sad thing about it is Google just repeatedly let some through Tata.

I have been really enjoying this game and managed to build up good monies. Except as of the last two days of playing I reached $999.99, but that is where I seemed to be stuck. For a while the ad feature would not load up, I was unable to advance. I now have been playing and ad feature has been loading up and I have probably have scored another $1,000.00 in pay, but it is not adding on, just stays at $999.99. Is there a fix for this problem? I would appreciate your help on this matter.

This game is fake. Don't waste your time. You try cash out $200 it make you wait 7 days then tells you that you have to spin the wheel 200 times. After that then say you need to get 30 gold bars. It stops giving gold bars at 29. No matter how much money you make spinning it stops putting at 999.99 they will never give you money.

So.. I have been playing this game for a bit now. I have requested 2 cashouts. It tells you it will take up to 7 days to receive, however I have waited far more than the time stated and have received nothing. Too many ads. This game is advertised falsely and the makers are dishonest. Do not waste your time on this game if you are playing for payouts. You will never see them. If I could give zero stars I would.

comments: Game is probably worth 3 stars if the dev wasn't ad crazy. A couple issues here. First is the sleep mechanic, a whole chunk of wait time with nothing happening (skippable with an ad), but that didn't cost a star. What does is the fact you need to watch ads to collect your achievement rewards. Also, if you haven't volunteered to watch an ad for more than a few minutes, it gives you one anyway with "take a break and watch a video". Playing games IS my break. Cant leave idle, as ads need closing.
Takes way to long to get the cash to upgrade anything, the only way to do so early on is by watching ads.
What's fun about a game that unless you watch ads you'll have nothing to do? Boring waste of my time.
5 stars because ads? Just turn off Wi-Fi Then no ads see .
Ads. Ads. Ads. More ads.

comments: Really fun, I actually just unlocked everything the other day and wish there was more. I powered through all the ads you had to get items and your staff. I just wish there was more things to buy cuz Im sitting on 400k and nothing else to do, I wish there was more cases and easier ways to get diamonds but I get the ads are necessary on your part. Clicking around in game is kinda of a hassle to get to where you want to go. And I'd write more but there's a limit. Oh well, over all good. Wants more

4 stars because I actually like the game. Disappointed that I already made it to the end and as high as the hotel goes. Says to wait but how long? Also not happy that I didn't know I was on the last level and I was having trouble so I sucked it up and bought a couple hints. I used one and now the rest are just sitting there ready to be used but theres no more levels. If I'd had known I was gonna lose money I would have just sat thru all the ads. Make more levels!

Cute animation. But ... Clearly translated, poorly, from some other language. The text is sort of comprehensible but so glaringly not English that it detracts from basic game play. My advice to the devs, hire a native English speaker who is literate and rewrite all dialogue and game instructions.

Great app, it's sweet and cunning without being overly complicated. It's an easy tap and click game, with a nice narrative, the art is cute and simple. It's just an overall nice game. Would and have recommended to others. Can't wait to see more.

It's fun! You can watch ads to help with anything and don't have to wait around to play the next level. Plus the game is generous with currency and no pressure to spend cash on anything. I've already finished all the levels though so I hope to see more soon.

comments: Well, turns out before I had been simply bamboozled. This review is staying strong! And the game too. Ever since I first found this game by chance, I've been playing it non-stop! Attendance rewards are cool, seasons are awesome as well, new emotes, dice and other stuff too. Heck, even bosses! Honestly, this game is phenomenal! Had no idea that the whole glitch with unplayability was a mere... uh. Thing, I guess. But hey, at least I get to play this again! 10/10!

So far, this game is amazingly addictive. The only complaint I have is the censorship in the legion chat room. Words such as: game, is, and sure get censored which is mildly annoying. Besides that this is a great game for passing time, playing with friends, or for competitive play.

This game has so much fun waiting for us! And it's also hard, I like the way you designed the bosses and the dices! And their powers/effects it's pretty creative. Edit:*fixed miss spelling and non sense* Thank you for your reply! I am still enjoying it(the game), Clash of Joy is very awesome and activily being updated.

It's a random dice reskin but definitely has unique elements to it and I think it can actually be really good with more work, i realize it's a fairly new game so not all the bugs are patched out yet, the most notable issues I've found are that monster health doesn't display going down when getting hit, and blocks shoot in strange directions, and the translating isn't the best, perhaps reach out on Facebook for people to give translations for descriptions of blocks

I like it. I can promise the reason you don't have more players is the limit on daily coops. I probably won't play very much until that has changed. Don't want to spend the time effort and potentially money on something I can clear in an hour or so and not make any more progress.

title: Alice's Resort - Word Puzzle Game
description:
Alice's Resort is a BRAND-NEW relaxing word game with interesting stories with Alice and her friends. Based on the classic word search or crossword gameplay, it allows you to enjoy thousands of challenging word cross puzzles in your hand.

You're a newly appointed manager of the hotel, and also the leader of Alice and Grace's team. When you heard the news that the resort would be closed, Alice asked you and Grace for help. You are decided to make plans to renovate and regain the glory of the resort...


‚û§ Highlights

‚òÖ RENOVATE & EXPLORE
You can collect resources during the game, renovate and redesign the island hotel to restore the former glory of the resort.
Explore the mysterious island by complete the various activities during the process of the game.
During the process of renovation and exploration, the dusty past stories will be unveiled. More characters with distinctive personalities will also will appear.
All the great moments on the island will be captured by the "Camera" and saved as treasured memory photos.

‚òÖ SUPER RELAXING WORD GAME:
Addictive word puzzle games based on classic gameplay.
Creative and unique story based on running a resort on a mysterious island.
Nice & Clear gaming graphics and user interfaces.
Thousands of word puzzles are ready for you to challenge.

‚òÖ AMAZING REWARDS & BOOSTERS:
Constantly find out correct words to make "Combos".
A "Bulb" helps you to find a word at a time.
A "Firecracker" helps you find a letter in a certain block.
A "Lightning" helps you to find 5 letters in different blocks.

‚òÖ MAKE MORE ACHIEVEMENTS:
Pass more levels to unlock themes.
Challenge to find "Extra Words" as many as possible.
Collect more items and themes for decoration.
More characters and various themes are waiting for you to discover.


‚û§ How to Play

- Swipe from one letter to another to line up words on the board vertically or horizontally
- Use a certain booster (such as "Shuffle", "Lightning", "Firecracker", "Bulb") for help when you get stuck
- Challenge to find all the hidden "Extra Words" as many as possible
- Purchasing items to decorate and renovate the restaurant
- Share to your friends for help when you get stuck

support@wordgame.freshdesk.com

comments: Love it until it doesn't work. I would have given it 5 stars except for this. I've enjoyed this game alot until I got to a new level and everything I buy never shows up. Literally the room I'm in at #180 is absolutely blank and no matter what I do it stays blank. I've rebooted my tablet and still nothing. And I even paid to have ads removed. Very frustrating. Now I hate it! UPDATE: After sending the above review and rebooting my tablet, all is well again. Thanks

I absolutely love this game. I can't find anything I don't like. I'm on level 456, so I'm far enough in to know it well. Yes, there are ads, but they're not constant. You can pay to remove, but I'm not bothered. Great game play, lots of little side quests, plenty of gems and coins. Nothing here to not love.

Installed yesterday. Gameplay mediocre as this app is a memory hog at launch. Today, videos don't load, app is taking a long time to load, crashing constantly, locking up and freezing my tablet. I've rebooted my tablet twice, reinstalled the app with zero improvement. Uninstalling as the only interaction I have with the app are it's issues.

Combines elements of several other games I've liked and played a lot, but not particularly well. I found the basic game play enjoyable enough despite being entirely different from the ads, but the whole rest of the game seems poorly executed. The music and general design annoyed me, and after making two design choices based on the furniture I found least objectionable I was forced to completely change my choices to go with bright blue wall paint. Not well planned out. Needs work.

I don't usually review the games I play, but I really like this game. This is one game that you truly don't have to spend real money to advance levels or to get the cool furniture. The two mini games that I've played don't require real money either. The words get longer and harder with the higher levels, but if you've played other word games, you already know the words to play.

title: Tears of Themis
description:
You are a rookie attorney with high hopes for the future who becomes entangled deeper and deeper into a great conspiracy throughout your investigations.
What seemed to be independent cases slowly begins to link together and form a larger picture.
The hand behind it all has no regards for social order and aims only to destroy all that is decent and good.
As the truth becomes more obscure and shrouded in mystery, the lines between good and evil blurs. With the world against you and the words of reason falling on deaf ears...
Will you still be determined to stand by your choices and beliefs?

Evidence Collection - Search the scene and uncover the truth
Discover delicate evidence and items lying at the crime scene and reveal the truth.
Acquire testimonies from suspects. Analyze and compare their testimonies to contradicting clues found on them to uncover the key evidence.
Defeat your opponents in the court of law with logic and wits to deliver true justice!

Exquisite Dynamic Illustrations - Learn everything about him
The exquisite Dynamic Illustrations brings cards to life, forever framing your treasured memory with him in vivid detail.
Once a personal story is unlocked, you will begin to receive video calls from your special someone! Indulge in his resonating voice and daily interactions!
Go on dates that will make you melt and experience heart-racing intimate moments. 

Precious Memories  - Create cherished memories together
Every character has their unique story arcs that hide his most well-guarded secrets.
Venture deeper into his heart by completing these stories to learn the truth about him, creating memories that belong to just the two of you. 

Offical WebsiteÔºöhttps://tot.mihoyo.com/en-us/
Offical Twitter AccountÔºöhttps://twitter.com/TearsofThemisEN
Offical Facebook FanpageÔºöhttps://www.facebook.com/tearsofthemis.glb
Customer ServiceÔºötotcs_glb@mihoyo.com

comments: it's great. the art and graphics are beautiful, the storyline is also quite interesting, the voice acting makes it even better! there has been no issues with the sound or graphics or lags for me. it's just a bit hard to gain/earn tears of themis for pulls but maybe it's just me? but overall it's one of the best games in the same genre/type that i've played.

An absolute beautiful otome game. The game has some technical flaws, like not loading over data, but it looks like the devs are aware and working on bugs. For a game in the first 2 weeks of launch, it has surprisingly few issues. As for game play: it reminds me of Ace Attorney mixed with dating sim. The investigations are wonderful and attention to detail on these are amazing. You can tell this was inspired by Ace Attorney but is also fresh and unique on it's own.

My rng is terrible with the gacha BUT I really like the illustrations, from the R cards to SSR cards and even backgrounds. The NPCs are hot too. The music is also good, sometimes I can't get the debate music out of my mind lol. I also like the episode length. The voice-acting is also top-tier. I wish the episodes (both main story and personal ones) were already released though, just because I feel like for a guaranteed of 100 pulls, content wherein F2P S-chips run out easily.

I'll be honest usually I don't review games on here mainly cause they bombard you with review us now things. However I willingly came hear to search and review this game. Not only is it gorgeous but it reminds me so much of a pheonix Wright game in the best way. All the trials and searching for clues is so much fun and it sucks you in so quick. I sweat I lost a good 4 hours last night playing this game. Highly recommend.

It's a great game! I love it! It has no ads, no lags and crashes(on my part), great graphics, awesome content, amazing voice acting(all of them has voices, wow!), And an amazing plot! I really hope it stays this way. The only thing i would suggest is for more ways to get assets such as coins, chips, and others. Overall, it's an amazing game that brought me back into otome games and visual novels. Love it!

title: Friday Night Mod FNF Music Battle
description:
Music Battle is a rhythm matching music game to test your musical knowledge and reflexes where you need to feel the beat of the music.

The FMF game has several characters: Boyfriend, Girlfriend, Daddy Dearest, Mommy Nearest, Monster, and Spirit. Besides, we have some guest characters like Skid and Pump, Pico, Tankman, and Whitty. Those all mods shall be your opponents or arriving to save Boyfriend and Girlfriend that appear through all the songs in full week (week 7 included) in Friday Night funny game.

As a music arrow game as well as a music battle game, to win all the battles of music in Friday night pumpkin, you should press at the Arrow in time with the beat and the music so that you can achieve a higher score than your opponents.

What should you do if you‚Äôre not in the mood to do something on Friday night? Joining this Funkin rap battle is the easiest way to boost your mood naturally. You and your Girlfriend can get rid of boring things on your mobile after a hard week.

You just need to tap the arrow when they perfectly match to get the highest score as much as you can. Feel Funkin rhythms! Dance with cg5! Beat all your enemies (like whitty, shaggy, garcello, miku, hex, sky, ugh, and savente) to prove your talent.

title: Old Friends Dog Game
description:
Welcome to Old Friends Dog Game, where love never grows old! A story game about friendship for people who love dogs, made in collaboration with the real Old Friends Senior Dog Sanctuary.
 
In this beautiful studio ghibli inspired game, you create your own dog sanctuary - nurture and care for adorable senior dogs by baking treats, petting and playing with them. As each dog‚Äôs loyalty toward you grows, unlock story episodes with choices and learn more about the dogs‚Äô loveable personalities.
 
This dog game is inspired by the famous organisation, Old Friends Senior Dog Sanctuary, where a real life team of dog-loving heroes care for and love senior dogs. Each of the beautiful characters you meet is based on a wonderful resident from the real-life sanctuary.
 
Some of the features that make Old Friends the most wholesome dog game:
 
‚ù§Ô∏è Take care of senior dogs - rescue and care for cute old doggos and spend your days loving them and growing their loyalty toward you. Become an animal care expert as you pet, feed and nurture your residents.  
 
üìò Choose your story - make choices as you unlock each narrative episode. As your dog's loyalty grows, you will unlock new narrative chapters! Enjoy adorable story episodes as you unlock chapter after chapter in this wholesome narrative game.
 
üíí Decorate your sanctuary home - decorate indoors and outdoors with cute furniture and toys that your residents will love. 
 
üßÅ Baking delicious treats - use your kitchen to get baking tasty treats for your pets, to earn more loyalty and unlock new story episodes!
 
üß£ Dress up your residents in their own cute outfits! Each dog has adorable accessories, which you earn as rewards in the narrative episodes.
 
üêï This game is full of all kinds of dogs - big dogs, small dogs, dogs the size of a horse! There is a favourite dog for everyone.
 
üì∑ Document your journey - make your very own sanctuary profile, complete with your custom avatar and full of cute snaps of your best doggy friends.
 
If you love story games and animal care, we made this game for you! Every animal deserves to be loved, whether they are an old senior or a young puppy ‚ù§Ô∏è  We hope you love spending time in your very own dog sanctuary, where love never grows old.
 
*** By award winning studio Runaway Play, with over 10 million downloads of wholesome animal games, including the best cat game Furistas Cat Cafe, plus cute games Bird BnB and Splash: Ocean Sanctuary and famous butterfly games Flutter: Butterfly Sanctuary and Flutter: Starlight ***
 
This adorable game is free to play but does contain some items to purchase for real money. If you run into any issues while playing or you have any suggestions, please reach out to us at support@runawayplay.com. OLD FRIENDS DOG SANCTUARY‚Ñ¢ is made by Runaway Play.

üßÅ Baking delicious treats - use your kitchen to get baking tasty treats for your pets, to earn more loyalty and unlock new story episodes!

üß£ Dress up your residents in their own cute outfits! Each dog has adorable accessories, which you earn as rewards in the narrative episodes.

üêï This game is full of all kinds of dogs - big dogs, small dogs, dogs the size of a horse! There is a favourite dog for everyone.

üì∑ Document your journey - make your very own sanctuary profile, complete with your custom avatar and full of cute snaps of your best doggy friends.

If you love story games and animal care, we made this game for you! Every animal deserves to be loved, whether they are an old senior or a young puppy ‚ù§Ô∏è We hope you love spending time in your very own dog sanctuary, where love never grows old.

*** By award winning studio Runaway Play, with over 10 million downloads of wholesome animal games, including the best cat game Furistas Cat Cafe, plus cute games Bird BnB and Splash: Ocean Sanctuary and famous butterfly games Flutter: Butterfly Sanctuary and Flutter: Starlight ***

This adorable game is free to play but does contain some items to purchase for real money. If you run into any issues while playing or you have any suggestions, please reach out to us at support@runawayplay.com. OLD FRIENDS DOG SANCTUARY‚Ñ¢ is made by Runaway Play.
summary: Care for cute senior dogs and play adorable story episodes in this animal game.

comments: Absolutely adorable while not being cheesy. Plays smooth on my 5 year old OnePlus. Everything seems to work as expected. Great job y'all! I play a lot of games, not usually anything mobile, but this is very relaxing and I love supporting OFDS! I rarely ever make in game purchases with real money, and this game definitely doesn't require it, but I just couldn't help myself this time....üòÅüòÅ Thank you so much for teaming up with OFDS.

Love this game so far! I just started playing, but so far, everything seems great! It's simple, easy, but Definitely not boring! I love how there's info on the dogs irl, and the art style is so cute! Very relaxing!

Such a cute game! I love reading about the dogs' IRL back stories and following the rescue page. I love that you can pop and out of the game through the day and there's always something to do, but not so much as to be overwhelming. A very heartwarming addition to my phone, and I love it!

Really, really fun!! I love the stories, they're so fun! And the clothes are super cute! This is a really good game!! The scrolling is a tiny bit wonky but it doesn't really bother me, I love all the dogs and there personalitys, 10 stars if I could!

Very cute, laid back game. It's pretty simple, but that makes it even better - I don't have to play it constantly, I can just check in when I've got 10 minutes. I've followed OFSDS on Instagram for a while and always love to see their photos, and it's fun to play with virtual versions of the dogs!

title: Dog Game - The Dogs Collector!
description:
With cute art and adorable mini-games, you‚Äôll be caring for your puppies in Dog Game any chance you get! Thousands have given Dog Game two furry paws up! üêæ

Dog Game is simple yet highly-addictive! To play, all you need to do is collect different kinds of cute & unique dogs and build a home for them, your very own Dog Tower! You can craft decoration and create lovely rooms to unlock cute new puppies to fill them with every single day.

Collect adorable dogs like shiba inu, husky, pug, bulldog, golden retriever and beagle! There‚Äôs over 900 puppys you can collect! üí´ Decorate rooms in your dog towers with your favourite styles: unicorn, fancy, legendary, anime, magic and so many more!


üåü DOG GAME HIGHLIGHTS

‚óè 900+ kawaii puppies to collect!
‚óè Watch your animals come to life with cute animations
‚óè Craft furniture and decorate your dream Dog Tower
‚óè Play special events and earn exclusive pups & prizes
‚óè Enter contests to design the most adorable rooms
‚óè Play fun & addictive mini-games to earn coins
‚óè Join a club & play with your friends (and make new ones)
‚óè Compete in the leaderboard for exclusive rewards

üè† DECORATE YOUR OWN PUPPY TOWER

Create & personalize an adorable dog tower for all of your puppies to live in! Craft adorable decorations like plants, couches, dog toys, windows, sandcastles and adorable animal furniture.

You will adopt dogs of different themes and vibes according to your own taste! 70‚Äôs, beach, dance club, farm, underwater, or royalty. 


üíñ PLAY GAMES WITH FRIENDS

Dog Game is a great pet game to play with friends! You can enter contests where you compete by designing the best dog room! You will play with dog lovers across the world! Dog Game is an amazing way to make new friends and socialize in new clubs!

Enter fun events throughout the year where you can earn unique rare dogs and special prizes! Unlock new challenging levels by playing minigames! 

Participate in non-stop dog-themed games like:

‚óè And more!


‚ú® YOUR VIRTUAL PET AWAITS YOU IN DOG GAME

comments: So far, this game has not worked at all for me. I love Cat Game, but this game wouldn't load the basket delivery for days. Then it finally loaded, but I couldn't get past the first floor due to not getting any logs. The dashboard doesn't tell me how much money I have or anything. When I closed and reopened the app, my data was erased. I emailed support, and I was told my account doesn't exist. What? Edit: reinstalling didn't help. "Backup data" put me back at nothing. This game is broken.

i loved cat game so much even though i'm a dog person so obviously i'm super into dog game! it really is the best. (1.) it's calming without being boring. (2.) you never run out of things to do, but there's no stressful feeling of like "ugh it's too much work." (3.) there's mini games! and the adorable dog home decor challenges? ugh yes, so fun! (4.) the mini games are actually fun and you get coins for playing them. i'd love a unicorn version in the future!

I LOVE THIS GAME ALREADY. However, I am stuck. I downloaded today and started to play but I would get stuck on the first floor. I'd get to the point I have three dogs but I can't do anything because I didnt get enough wood to make floors since I got dogs instead. There's also no other options for me to do. Then, when I try resetting, my data is erased and I'm just left with Archie. There are still no other options and the tutorial doesn't continue either. Help?

Very broken, very bad. Tutorial immediately broke and would not let me progress and got stuck on a shadowed screen, there is no x button to exit the dogepedia, there is no material basket available in the dogepedia and I do not have the necessary materials to continue so I cant even finish the tutorial. Because I cannot finish the tutorial I cannot check the event and my phone is being spammed with dozens of notifications telling me "zodiac event starts today" "zodiac event starts in 1 hour"

I play "Cat Game" as well this game is just as cute and is easy to play, however it's not as convenient as "Cat Game". I don't like the way hearts cannot be collected in one tap and expire too quickly. It takes up too much space on the club screen and messes with our club's ability to chat.

title: Wonderland : Beauty & Beast Free
description:
Wonderland has a new magical location where kids can create and role-play their own beauty and the beast fairy tale story! In an enchanting palace, ballroom and stables the beast awaits true love, will he find it? it is all up to you! Fun and adventure awaits, find the hidden room, discover all hideouts and check out all the new characters and clothing. Wonderland is a game where kids make up the story as they play. Role-play and imagination are all that is needed to create a new adventure!

FEATURES:
- Exciting new location, with lots of places to discover and explore!
-The prince has a dark secret in his room, can you find out what it is?
- Lots of new character including the Beauty and the Beast of course
- There are lots of hidden treasures to be found around the palace, some are hard to find!
- This game will connect to any other Wonderland game we shall release‚Ä¶ yes, More games coming!
- Multi touch-enabled so you can play with friends or family on the same device.
- A stress-free environment for kids to play at. No winning or losing. Just creative gameplay and hours of it!

WE MAKE GAMES KIDS WANT TO PLAY
If you have ever written to us then you probably know that we are reading all your comments, Fan emails and Facebook message. Let us know what theme you would love to see next and if there are enough requests you will probably have a nice surprise a few months ahead. So don‚Äôt be shy, if you have an idea, a bug, a complaint or you just want to say hello, make sure to connect with us. 

RECOMMENDED AGE GROUP
This game is perfect for Kids 4 -12, the game promotes creative thinking, imaginative gameplay and endless role-playing game time. Wonderland games are safe to play even when parents are out of the room. We have No Ads, No 3rd Party Ads, and no IAP. 

ABOUT MY TOWN GAMES STUDIO
The My Town Games studio designs digital dollhouse-like games that promote creativity and open-ended play for your children all over the world. Loved by children and parents alike, My Town games introduce environments and experiences for hours of imaginative play. The company has offices in Israel, Spain, Romania and the Philippines. For more information, please visit www.my-town.com

title: Journey Decor
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the beautiful design journey!üòò

As a great designerüë©‚Äçüé®, not only need to have professional knowledge, and need to have a broad vision, travel around the world to design different architectural styles of buildings! From Paris to Tokyo, from New York to London, the world is in your design!üéâ
The architectural style within the game can also be reflected in reality, matching different styles of furniture to exercise their design in realityüè†. To get more design inspiration, you need to solve the match-3 puzzles. Trust me, the match-3 part is just as exciting as the building part!üíï

-HOW TO PLAY-
‚óèSwap to match 3 or more similar tiles in a line to crush them.
‚óèMake a square of four to create the paper plane.
‚óèMatch 5 or more to create amazing boosters
‚óèFind different kinds of powerful combos is the key to solve puzzles and beat the levels.
‚óèBeat the levels to get more coins which are the necessary sources to buy decorations

-FEATURES-
‚óèüÜìCompletely free game to play;
‚óèüé®Traveling and designing all over the world;
‚óèüéâVarious interesting events in every week;
‚óèüòçVivid character and attractive detective story;
‚óèüèÜPlay with friends and share your works;

title: Potato Smash
description:
Welcome, Summoner!

The Slime King has invaded our land. Summon Potatoes and form a team. Fight back against the horde of monsters and defend the Potato Kingdom!

Potato Smash is a cute tower defense game where you recruit and upgrade your team of Potatoes. Engage other players in a battle of wits and fortune, or work together to fend off the invasion of the slimes.

Merge Potatoes to increase their Merge level and enhance their abilities. However, they will turn into different Potatoes after merging so it's up to you to decide when to merge them. Each battle will be a test of courage and wit. Are you up for the challenge? Form your team and merge your Potatoes to defend the kingdom!

‚Äî‚Äî Game Features ‚Äî‚Äî

‚óè Unique Potatoes ‚óè
Up to a hundred Potatoes with different appearances and skills! Upgrade their unique skills to greatly boost their strength, and upgrade their levels by collecting duplicate Potatoes. There are many ways to get Legendary Potatoes and they await you!

‚óè Diverse Lineups ‚óè
Mix and match Potatoes across the four Potato types! Form different lineups based on various battle modes. Even a Common Potato can be as powerful as a Legendary Potato when put in a good team!

‚óè Fun Mechanisms ‚óè
Brand new combat mechanisms! Develop strategies that counter your opponent's lineups. Destroy monsters on your side fast to spawn more monsters for your opponent. The quicker player wins! You'll need to employ strategy in your lineup and upgrades, along with a dash of luck to clinch your victory!

‚óè Various Modes ‚óè
Play in any of the battle modes available, including the heated Versus mode, the Co-op mode requiring teamwork, the Random Arena that keeps things fresh, and the thrilling Gold League where the best players fight it out! Every mode brings endless fun and we are sure you can find one that best suits you!

‚óè Cute Designs ‚óè
Cuteness is justice! Every Potato has an adorable and refreshing design, including the pretty princess, the comical clown, the holy angel, and more. Collect them all and enjoy the explosion of cuteness!

=== Information ===
[Official Facebook]: https://www.facebook.com/PotatoSmashGlobal
[Official Instagram]: https://www.instagram.com/PotatoSmashGlobal
[Official Discord]: https://discord.gg/ZTXey2mUk6

title: Port City: Ship Tycoon
description:
All the ship lovers, ship collectors and ship simulation enthusiasts who love everything ship transport related unite! It‚Äôs time to put your ships on waters and build a port city and a global ship empire. Become a ship tycoon and enjoy a beautiful ship simulation journey full of surprises, city customizations, achievements and challenging contracts. Express your ship self!
Discover and collect hundreds of famous real life ships. The better the ship, the more cargo it can take, the easier your strategy becomes. It can become quite challenging sometimes, but as a ship tycoon looking to build the biggest ship empire in the world you‚Äôll find a way!
Shipping the required cargo and completing various contracts is the key to develop your port city.
Upgrading ships comes in handy because an upgraded ship fleet is way more powerful when completing contracts and can save a lot of time on waterways! Did you know that there are ship rarity categories in this tycoon city simulation? Rare ships have higher transport capacity! Bending rules of a port city tycoon simulator has never been easier either.
Port City game tycoon features:
 ‚ñ∂ Own popular ships from history of maritime transport
‚ñ∂ Collect famous cargo ships, upgrade them and reach their full transport potential
‚ñ∂ Meet interesting contractors and complete ship freight transport and logistics jobs
‚ñ∂ Coordinate and transport your ships according to your own simulation strategy
‚ñ∂ Enhance your port city and build bigger and better transport facilities and docks to fit more ships 
‚ñ∂ Explore new global regions as your ships travel the seas through bridges and islands
‚ñ∂ Play new events every month in the Port City Ship Tycoon
‚ñ∂ Team up with fellow ship tycoon enthusiasts during events & work together
‚ñ∂ Compete in leaderboards to become the biggest ship tycoon
‚ñ∂ Dispatch freight ships to collect resources and transport those to your contractors & city to complete jobs
Are you up for a transport challenge and ready to collect ships, to build and manage a global city and ship empire and become the biggest global ship tycoon in the Port City world?
Have you encountered a ship contract which does not suit your strategy? You can easily swap the ship transport requirements, or cargo requirements to get a better fit for your sea transportation needs. Both kids and adults can do this!
PLEASE NOTE! Port City is an online free strategy tycoon simulation game to download and play that requires a network connection to play. Some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
Do you have any suggestions or problems in your port city? Our caring community managers would love to hear from you, visit https://care.pxfd.co/portcity!
Terms of Use: http://pxfd.co/eula Privacy Policy: http://pxfd.co/privacy
Do you enjoy our 3D tycoon simulation game? Follow @portcitygame on social media to get the latest news and updates.

Shipping the required cargo and completing various contracts is the key to develop your port city.
Upgrading ships comes in handy because an upgraded ship fleet is way more powerful when completing contracts and can save a lot of time on waterways! Did you know that there are ship rarity categories in this tycoon city simulation? Rare ships have higher transport capacity! Bending rules of a port city tycoon simulator has never been easier either.
Port City game tycoon features:
‚ñ∂ Own popular ships from history of maritime transport
‚ñ∂ Collect famous cargo ships, upgrade them and reach their full transport potential
‚ñ∂ Meet interesting contractors and complete ship freight transport and logistics jobs
‚ñ∂ Coordinate and transport your ships according to your own simulation strategy
‚ñ∂ Enhance your port city and build bigger and better transport facilities and docks to fit more ships
‚ñ∂ Explore new global regions as your ships travel the seas through bridges and islands
‚ñ∂ Play new events every month in the Port City Ship Tycoon
‚ñ∂ Team up with fellow ship tycoon enthusiasts during events & work together
‚ñ∂ Compete in leaderboards to become the biggest ship tycoon
‚ñ∂ Dispatch freight ships to collect resources and transport those to your contractors & city to complete jobs
Are you up for a transport challenge and ready to collect ships, to build and manage a global city and ship empire and become the biggest global ship tycoon in the Port City world?
Have you encountered a ship contract which does not suit your strategy? You can easily swap the ship transport requirements, or cargo requirements to get a better fit for your sea transportation needs. Both kids and adults can do this!
PLEASE NOTE! Port City is an online free strategy tycoon simulation game to download and play that requires a network connection to play. Some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
Do you have any suggestions or problems in your port city? Our caring community managers would love to hear from you, visit https://care.pxfd.co/portcity!
Terms of Use: http://pxfd.co/eula Privacy Policy: http://pxfd.co/privacy

title: Dodge Agent
description:
Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to break into the most heavily guarded safe vault in the world, bypassing lethal security systems and hundreds of armed guards, in order to steal the key to saving the world. You are a secret agent known only as the Dodge Agent, a master of evasive acrobatics, stealth, and infiltration. You can bypass any security system in the world. You can evade entire armies of armed security guards. But can you be the special agent who saves the world?

Who needs lock picking? Why unlock a gate when you can scale the wall? Why disarm the laser security when you can dive past the lasers faster than the eye can see? You don't need any equipment except your amazing ninja skills and lightning fast reflexes. Keep to the shadows and sprint to your goal, this is a fast paced action game and you better be ready to keep up!

Features:
Swipe to Dodge! Sprint through high tech laser security fields, swipe to jump and dive past the lasers to reach your goal!
Lethal Obstacles! Those lasers will slice you down into little pieces if you're not careful, watch out!
Challenging Gameplay! Easy to pick up, harder to master. You need cat like reflexes to be the best secret agent in the world, do you have what it takes?
Explore the World! Your targets are scattered all over the world, each stealth mission will take you to a new location with new obstacles and enemies. 
Dozens of Secret Agents to play as! Pirouette around the guards as the ballerina. Sling through the lasers with Spidey's string shooters. Go unseen and unheard as the Cat Burglar, master of stealth and shadow. Can you unlock them all?
Amazing Graphics! Experience the Dodge Agent vaulting over glittering laser beams in the best HD graphic quality!

Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

From the Studio that brought you Mr. Bullet, Happy Glass, Ink Inc and Love Balls!

Follow us to get news and updates on our other Award Winning titles;
https://lionstudios.cc/
Facebook.com/LionStudios.cc
Instagram.com/LionStudioscc
Twitter.com/LionStudiosCC
Youtube.com/c/LionStudiosCC

description:
Crop Crack is a addictive funny puzzle game. In this game, you just need to click the adjacent candies of the same color to eliminate them all. Try it now and you will love this game very soon!

Blasting-Directional elimination, where to eliminate and revitalize the whole situation!

Color change-magic props, meticulous layout, maximize score!

Flip the grid props to make your situation clearer!

FEATURES

- This android app is totally FREE.
- Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master.
- There are elaborate game sound effects and music which make you feel good.
- Mouth-watering new graphics, Crop Crack looks even tastier!

title: Tides: A Fishing Game
description:
Relax and unwind in this idle fishing adventure game. Sail to new islands and destinations with serene visuals, soothing music, and simple gameplay. Unlock new boats, collect pets, and hire idle fishing assistants so you never miss a chance to earn money on your adventure!

Features: 
Choose the game you want to play: Actively discover new islands to catch rare fish or upgrade your home island to collect idle income while you are away. 
Unlock and upgrade legendary boats to help you on your adventure.
Complete jobs to catch rare and elusive fish.
Collect and upgrade pet companions to increase idle earnings. 

Stay tuned for new features, islands, fish and more. We hope you enjoy our humble idle fishing adventure game!

title: NieR Re[in]carnation
description:
The latest game in the NieR series arrives on mobile devices!

NieR Re[in]carnation is a command-action RPG for mobile devices from Square Enix and Applibot.

„Éº„Éº„Éº„Éº„Éº

- Story / It is a place called The Cage.
A girl awakens on a cold stone floor.
She finds herself in an infinitely vast place filled with buildings that touch the very sky.
Guided by a mysterious creature who calls herself Mama, she begins to explore her new surroundings.
To reclaim what she has lost‚Äîand atone for her sins‚Äîshe sets off on a journey through this place of unknown creation.
...A place known as The Cage. 

- Character Info
The Girl of Light
When the girl came to, she was collapsed on the stone floor of The Cage. Though she is kind and has a bright personality, she wears a collar and bandages for reasons unknown, and is plagued each night by horrible dreams.

Mama
A mysterious creature who calls herself Mama. She seems to know something about The Cage, and acts as a guide for the girl.

The Dark Monster
A strange being that wanders The Cage. It resembles a knight in armor, but also a speechless insect. Regardless, it seems to have some kind of goal...
Battles play out by issuing commands to your characters.

- Battle
Battles play out by issuing commands to your characters.
This game includes an auto mode that makes your characters attack enemies all on their own, making it easy for people who aren't as skilled at video games to join in and play as well.

- Staff
Producer: Yosuke Saito
Creative Director: Yoko Taro
Director: Daichi Matsukawa
Main Character Design: Akihiko Yoshida (CyDesignation, Inc.)
Concept Art: Kazuma Koda
Music: Keiichi Okabe (MONACA INC.)

- This game contains some paid items that are available for purchase.
Purchasing said items may incur additional charges.

- Recommended environment: Android 7 or later

comments: The game is fun! I really like the story as it reads to me, and the beautiful art and the music is just as pleasing to my ears. I am happy to see that it is not hard to progress in the game and we are even gifted early rewards to make it just that much more plesant and rewarding playing the game. Honestly not happy with the summon rates at all, yet love the fact that there is a pity system that fells worth all the failed attempts to pull what you intended; quite like a sour patch. Great Game!

The story so far is intriguing, the music is phenomenal, and the gameplay is overall basic. The gacha rates seem alright too. But this game feels weirdly optimised. It recommended "High" settings for me, but the game doesn't even run properly on "Low" or "Medium" on my phone. I have been able to run other 3D games such as 7 Deadly Sins just fine, but this game is much more detailed in comparison. I've had a few crashes, but nothing too bad personally. Overall a good experience for a Nier fan.

This game is good. It's still too early to tell much, but from what I have played it's so good. The stories are great, most of the gameplay can be afk'ed. What I like is the grind can be afk, so I don't have to be near phone at all for that. Also the game is f2p friendly for now. All in all worth it. Eagerly looking forward to how they decide to advance the game

i really want to say this game is great...but i can't... the music/graphics/story are great, but hardly outstanding...SquareEnix is famous for their music and graphics, so it's hardly surprising they nailed it...as for the rest... it's not a game, it's a very entertaining gatcha...i have no problem spending money on games, and i do spend money on games, because I'm a gamer...nier is as much fun to play as a slot machine... FF Mobius - released in 2015! - had more going for it as a game...

Very cinematic with a great soundtrack and interesting stories. The interface could do with some work, particularly around memoirs (i.e. filtering options). Had a few technical issues on launch but they seem to have been resolved. The game is not very well optimised and performance on relatively decent phones is a bit lacking. Not many attractive deals in the premium shop but re-rolling is quick and you can get a decent start as f2p once you're happy with your initial rolls.

title: Auto Defense
description:
Protect your castle, build powerful synergies, unlock, merge, and upgrade your turrets. Sweep roguelite enemy waves and complete distinct worlds while insatiable alien swarms chow down on your castle.

Master the art of mixing and merging your turrets to unlock new strategies and send the invaders running. Create any combination of carnage you can imagine with limitless options. Turrets are ready to unleash the lightning, let loose the poison, set them ablaze with explosions, and much more in epic battles.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY
Build an array of towers that fire endlessly and automatically at any invaders, just like in an auto-battler. Defend your territory and battle against enemies that invade your world using their best tactics. 

BUILD SYNERGIES AND MERGE TURRETS MID-BATTLE
Mix & Merge Turrets in the heat of battle to boost their power and unleash invincible abilities.Discover endless synergies between towers to squash the enemy. Play Auto Defense for nonstop fun while clearing roguelite enemy waves and completing exciting worlds.

A CUSTOMIZABLE ARSENAL FOR THE BATTLE
Complete missions to earn rewards, including powerful Turret cards, gear, and gems to protect your castle and forge a better strategy against your enemies.  
Upgrade towers and craft brand-new defenses between battles. Maintain your winning streak and move further on the map to complete your tower roster.
Utilize many Turrets‚Äô unique abilities, including freeze, electricity, blast, and more to create undefeatable synergies.

ALWAYS SOMETHING NEW TO EXPLORE
Unlock wild new worlds filled with fresh challenges and exciting environments, including frozen tundra, sand-swept deserts, and even lands beyond the stars.
Adapt your strategy depending on the location your battle takes place in, and be prepared for new and compelling challenges.

We update the game regularly so you can always explore new levels and maps. Take on limited-time events with unique missions to earn exclusive prizes.

comments: For some reason the tutorial level just doesnt work. I can get into it but nothing happens besides the monsters going towards my tower, even when they get to the tower, they just start moving back and forth along it. I cant place towers or do anything besides closing the app and starting it back up. This looks like a cool game so please hurry up and fix this.

Fun to play if you learn it, quite challenging, maybe upgrades are needed. Some issue on the game, works mostly on my phone but other phone (Samsung Galaxy) can't even start the game just crashed. Lag and sometimes froze, try minimizing the texture. Ads can be quite annoying too at middle of rounds. Please make more difference between Combat Rifle and Assassin Gun always confuses me, thank you!

While the game concept overall it's above average the main problems are withthe bugs and interestlostof the game itself. Firstof all with friend play i dont know how but i got a player level 25... and onthe second wave we died because came a big bunch of big hp enemy, second the game overheats the phone so the phone cant render stuff and the turrets i place just phantom turrets they dont shoot or anything , you need to restart the phone too before you can play again... sad but still 3 stars

Okay, nice strategy game, excellent graphics, audio is amazing, multiplayer is amazing as well one. one can say that this game is a great game and started off well and will see better improvements in the near futureüëèüèæ

The concept is pretty good , but execution still needs work , theres over 30 types of towers that you randomly get 3 of them everytime you refresh and you get very few slots to place them, and often you need multiple slots for the same tower to make it higher star , so pretty much you will be spending more money refreshing to find the right tower than buying towers or upgrading. Need to change something to make it less of just waiting refreshing the whole game till u find nothing and lose.
