The only chance they fulfill the task is your merge magic to MATCH EVERYTHING! This gift passed down by generations of priests aids the expedition to new lands and daily maintenance of the tribe.

Fight against dark minions with the help of heroes to awaken corrupted lands. Merge creatures to develop the tribe, then explore more lands and unlock new storylines. Create every tribal member a merge mansion by following the instruction of tribal artisans. Merge everything you‚Äôve got to save those amazing species and acquire powerful items told by ancient fables.

Accompany helpful allies and almighty heroes, help the frantic yet optimistic tribal members, rebuild their lost homeland, and lead the tribe to revival! 



Features:

== Excellent Objects ==
- Match and tap Orbs to unleash Life Essence to cure the Corrupted Land.
- Collect Orbs, Spirit Essence, Berries, Rainbow Sculpts, Pearls to prepare your hunt for lost treasures.
- Merge Dragons, Mammoths, Fairies, Unicorns, Nymphs, and Grumpy Mice to experience more game plots such as dragon mania legends and the origin of klondike. 
- Upgrade Mystery Nebulae, Undersea Remains, Moon Wells, Carvings of Embla, and Druid's Rune Portals to harvest rare resources and gain precious eggs even including dragon eggs in this stone age caveman game.

== Challenging Puzzles ==
- More than 1000 tasks exercise your skills to solve tricky issues.
- Over 200 strategy-involved levels with different merge design styles awaits you!
- Fulfill side gigs in your merge life to uncover hidden scenes ‚Äì can you save all the lost tribal members?

== Powerful Heroes ==
- Encounter various new heroes in the journey.
- Revive the tribe alongside heroes with unique skills. Develop the merge camp even into a merge city!
- Strengthen Heroes‚Äô skills to embrace your solving abilities. You will get an islands game of more satisfactory once you do more skill matches!

To ensure everyone enjoy in a fabulous time-management and collecting game experience, we spent over 2 years developing and provided the most accessible gameplays and the smoothest match and merge experience! This is one of the most ambitious merge games ever!


Come on! Don't miss the chance to be a top world-class MERGE MASTER! 
Download and start your MEEERGE adventure right now!

title: Muscle Hero
description:
Destroy walls, crash cars, throw boulders and be almost invulnerable.

SUPERHERO FIGHTING
You play as a giant superhero, a green-skinned man, muscular humanoid possessing a vast degree of physical strength. Unlike spider hero, iron hero and other superheroes, you have enormous musculature and savage fury. 

CRAFT NEW SKILLS
Unlock new super abilities by gaining fighting experience and becoming an even more powerful man.

BECOME THE SUPER FIGHTER AGAINST CRIMINAL GANGS
This fighting game takes place in a criminal city - same like Iron Hero and Spider Hero games. Crime supervillains are your rivals and you have to save the city by defeating them using your man strength. The grand city is under the supervillains‚Äô oppression. As a superhero, do your best to defeat bosses in the best fighting game! 

EPIC STREET FIGHTING GAME
The street fighting game is created in the beat 'em up genre, like one of the best superhero games. Perform melee attacks, crush everything on your way by using epic super abilities.

UNLOCK NEW COMBOS AND ABILITIES
Use passive skills and active abilities: throw stones to enemies, crush walls and smash cars.

title: Laser Trap Master
description:
Time to tangle...tangle your enemies and trip them up, that is! In Laser Trap Master, you need to take on the hoards of enemy fighters in your path to win the race, armed with only one trusty weapon‚Äîyour laser gun.

Take aim and fire your weapon against the incoming forces. Tangle them in your laser web and wrangle them incapable of standing a chance against your might. Think it's simple, it's not! You'll need to try hard to catch those tricky laser evaders. But don't worry! You'll have so much fun doing it.

title: Stickman Battle Empires War
description:
Stickman Battle Empires War - a new fun and addictive real-time strategy game with famous stickman heroes! RTS game in a medieval setting with elements of survival, you can control your army and individual warriors.

Get gold to recruit more fighters to your army. At your disposal: miner, stickman warrior, archer, Spartan, giant, and even a catapult. Upgrade your army by improving the skills and weapons of the stickmen. Strengthen your fortress. Get ready for the legendary battle of the stickmen. The outcome of the battle depends only on you.

üéØCampaign Mode
Complete an exciting stickman adventure in campaign mode. Conquer new lands ranging from ancient Rome, Troy to Asia and Egypt. Immerse yourself in the era of medieval battles and the legacy of ancient civilizations. Defend your castle from the invasion of enemy troops of stickmen, Vikings, samurai and pirates. Besiege the enemy castle and destroy it to win. Use unique tactics for each battle and location. More than 20 unique tasks are waiting for you!


‚ò†Ô∏èSurvival Mode
The bonus survival mode will allow you to take part in an endless battle. Earn points to upgrade your soldiers and towers. Manage your resources correctly to survive. You must survive as long as possible from the raid of enemy warriors. 

‚öîÔ∏èOnline mode
Fight against players from all over the world or friends online. Show whose army of stickmen is cooler.

Game Features:
- Many new game locations and levels
- New design that will appeal to all fans of stickman games!
- Unique and new characters
- Large selection of game modes
- Upgrade army and units
- Bonus levels
- Amazing stunts and animations!
- Amazing HD graphics
- Exclusive soundtrack
- Hardcore gameplay

title: Kung fu Supreme
description:
Welcome to play the super casual martial-arts placement mobile game! Innovative gameplay, AFK battles! Can you defeat the masters here?
In the world of martial arts, you play the role of a swordsman who has entered the world for the first time, start to practice martial arts for the sake of world peace, look for the Kung-fu moves and all kinds of treasures in the east, and make your contribution in saving the world.
Here, you can practice, advance and break through all kinds of esoteric martial arts, experience the charm of mental, fist, leg, sword and knife techniques,comprehend the extensive and profound Oriental Kung-fu, and practice with the masters around the world. 
„ÄêGame Features„Äë
AFK battles, no need for excessive manual operations
Level breakthrough, place restricted techniques and skills
Various martial arts, adjust tactics for different enemies
Martial-arts tournament, practice to unify the country
World treasures, defeat opponents to receive bounties
„ÄêGame Highlights„Äë
You can challenge various regional masters in the game, get all kinds of treasures, experience the pleasure of eliminating enemies, and become a superhero admired by the world.
In addition, you can also continue to upgrade and strengthen yourself, and try to break through the levels. Improve your own combat power continuously, so that you will be invincible in the Kung-fu world.
There are also vivid and moving story lines, interesting farming and alchemy processes in the game, which restores a true and original
Kung-fu world for you.

Subscription Instructions and Subscription Functions
1. Subscription Prices & Periods
You can subscribe to the Premium Privilege Pack in the game (subscription price is $4.99, subscription period is 30 days);You can subscribe to the Invincible Privilege Membership in the game (subscription price is $14.99, subscription period is 30 days).
2. About Subscription Content
The users who subscribe to the Premium Privilege Pack can immediately receive the privilege of claiming 30 ingots by logging in daily, increasing the chances to challenge in the daily tournament by 2 times and enhancing the battle power by 10% in battles during the subscription period, and the privilege takes effect immediately in the game.
The users who subscribe to the Invincible Privilege Pack can immediately receive the privilege of claiming 100 ingots by logging in daily, increasing the chances to challenge in the daily tournament by 5 times, enhancing the battle power by 20% in battles, increasing the chances to challenge ancient beasts by 1 time, increasing the gains of power obtained from each lucid ganoderma by 0.5 hours, increasing the gains from closed practice by 5% and freeing ads in the power doubling system for 30 days, and the privilege takes effect immediately in the game.
3. About Auto-renewal Subscription
The official subscription feature for Android Google Play is auto-renewal subscription. Users need to manually turn off the auto-renewal feature in the Settings Management of Google Play. If the auto-renewal feature is not turned off within one day before the end of the subscription period, the subscription cycle will be automatically renewed.

4. Privacy Policy and Statement
Privacy Statement: http://www.mujoy.sg/pc/policy.html
Terms of Service: http://www.mujoy.sg/pc/policy.html

„ÄêCustomer Service Email„Äëkfwx@mujoy.sg

comments: This game is the best so far for grinding and leveling up. I don't see any problem with the mechanism of the system. You have to level up more or water your plant and get enough power each time. I see more benefits than other players. I'm around chapter 3 so far and it is a promising game.

The game is good, idle rpg with cultivation/wuxia themes. The major problem for me is whenever i'm in a battle my combo keep getting canceled by opponent's attack, while my attack never cancel theirs. Please dont reply with your template here, just fix it. Thanks. (It could be 5 star)
Strangely enticing the adds looked great, the game not so, very slow, but, it actually not simple, still slow, but slowly challenging. 5‚òÜgenerous but been on it a couple of hours and still going .

Pretty stupid battle system.. You can't interrupt or cancel an enemy's technique but yours can (especially the last hit that deals the most damage) Also, don't believe the *counter* mechanic for it is useless

I give 3 stars only because I cannot control the battles manually. With all the game can do it would make this game THE BEST GAME EVER if the player were able to play manually. But we cannot so for that this game only gets 3 stars

title: Merge Master:Animal Kingdom
description:
Welcome to the world of Merge Master: Animal Kingdom! Here, you can obtain more and more advanced objects through merging and discover the mysterious mainland.
Due to the evil witch's curse, nearly all lands of the animal kingdom are covered by thick clouds. You, a merge master, are the only hope to break this fearful curse! Show your strong fusion talent to merge 3 or more of a kind objects to awake more sleeping lands.
As the land continues to expand, you can explore this unknown but attractive land in¬†depth. The fusion of infant animals can produce marvellous energies, which to make them evolve to higher creatures. More interesting puzzle levels are waiting for you to challenge. Just win to gain plentiful¬†rewards and bring them back to your own homestead!

Special Features

== Merge objects¬†==
Hundreds of different objects for fusion.
Merge 3 of a kind objects to upgrade.

== Evolve animals¬†==
Dozen of cute animals for collection, merge and evolve them to obtain the higher level.
Dispatch animals to patrol in your kingdom, capture items for usage and fusion.

== Break the curse¬†==
Collect and upgrade more cute animals to help you break the witch's curse, unlock plots in your homestead.

== Build your kingdom¬†==
On the Open Type Game board, use your creativity to design and build your unique kingdom.

== Interesting Levels¬†==
Over 150 interesting puzzle levels await you to challenge, a large amount of rewards help you build your dream homestead.

Follow us on: https://bit.ly/3ClGtl1
Contact Us:support_en@bb.game

Build up, upgrade and expand your millionaire farming empire in this capitalist tap clicker game. Improve your productivity by automating your specialized farms by investing in your new managers and level up their earnings. 
Your farmer will take care of harvesting your crops plants like corn, wheat, hay, coffee, potato, tomato, rice, cabbage, tea or tropical fruit, and farm animals like cow, goat, kettle, sheep, or chicken, even mining resources such as coal, stone or iron. 
Idle Farming Tycoon: Build Farm Empire is different from other idle clicker games because your crops have to be also transported to the village. As much as you will transport the harvest to the village, the village will grow up and become a city soon. You will transport crops from your farm by ferry and later by boat, ship, fast train, or faster airplane.
You will maximize your earning profits and your farming empire will boost a huge growth up the city by delivering the crops to the city. Your farming empire can be improved also by researching new technologies and building a factory. Easily our empire will become a vegetable farm, ranch farm, animal farm, and the most profitable farm in the world. You will merge the harvest for creating lemonade or juice. comments: Just started playing. A fan of the developer's first game, Pocket Ships. This game has slightly better and more involved game mechanics, and requires thinking to excel. It's not a case of build farms and sit back. So far, harder than Ships and a lot more to explore and expand, good twist is the lab to upgrade various aspects. Hoping they'll port over some of these concepts to Ships!

I'm going to start by saying I hate the increasing amount of clutter on screen to buy stuff or watch ads. With that out of the way, 3 stars for making a generic but otherwise fine game... yep, that's all I have to say.

Man, what a great game! Got gems just for telling them if I liked the game or not. Also got a pretty good amount amount stuff in a piggy bank. Without having to pay real money for it like other games similar to this one. That's awesome. I lore this game!

First time playing. Enjoying so far. On my android phone, the volume of the music and sound of the game is barely hearable, but the ads are blaringly loud. Need a way to adjust game volume, not just on or off. üëç

This game isn't what I expected it was at the start, but I found myself pleasantly surprised with how fluent and easy it was to figure things out. I'm having lots of fun with it so far, looking forward to more in the future.

title: The Witcher: Monster Slayer
description:
The Witcher: Monster Slayer is an augmented-reality exploration game that challenges you to become an elite monster hunter. As you explore the real world around you, each step will take you deeper into a dark fantasy adventure.

Track monsters, learn their habits, and prepare for battle. Select the best weapons and armor, and brew powerful witcher potions to gain the upper hand before you begin a battle. As you gain experience and take on more dangerous foes, you will need to improve your skills, your gear, and your tactics in order to become a monster slayer of true renown.

TRACK YOUR TARGETS ‚Äî Use real-time weather conditions, time of day, and all your witcher senses to hunt monsters living around you.

EXPLORE ADVANCED AUGMENTED REALITY ‚Äî Make the dark fantasy world of the Witcher your reality with AR features that change your perception of places you thought you knew.

EMBARK ON ADVENTURES ‚Äî Experience quests that propel you through deep, story-driven adventures inspired by the Witcher series.

GATHER TROPHIES FROM FALLEN FOES ‚Äî Defeat dozens of different beasts and grow a collection worthy of a true monster slayer.

recentChanges:
Greetings, Witchers!

We're happy to introduce the 1.0.3 hotfix, in which:

‚Äì we've fixed the game lock that sometimes occurred while investigating the monolith
‚Äì we've fixed the friend referral link that failed to send a friend request
‚Äì we've fixed app crashes that occurred while the app was starting
‚Äì we've fixed random crashes during quests
‚Äì we've fixed notifications for some quests

See you on the Path!
comments: Overall, I love this take on a game like this, especially in the Witcher universe. Crafting and exploring is easy to work with and understand. Though if I had any real criticism it's that defensive combat is, for lack of a better term, the drizzling sh*ts. If a block accidentally reads as a swipe on your screen, you're boned, and feels somewhat disjointed because of it's lopsided timing and sensitivity. I still have a lot of fun playing this, mind you, I'm just going to keep dying regularly.

An okay game. I feel as though it has conflicting interests. There is far too much downtime for a game where you walk around to complete objectives. The world appears empty. There's nothing wrong with that, in theory, but I feel like the rewards don't justify the amount of time waiting/walking around. There is another issue where quests appear in physically impossible locations. Such as non-public property in the US, or in the middle of a lake, or unreachable areas in mountains. Still fun idea

Much more exciting, involving, and complex in mechanical depth than other open world/AR games that are available. The monsters are cool. The quests are engaging. And, I'm much more likely to explore in the real world, in order to encounter either one. Beware!: it is tempting, and worthwhile to spend REAL money on in-app purchases, which only made me more invested. I'm ready for MANY more quests!

Nice game plays well. My main issue is the timed quests, sorry you have to work and don't have time to go out of the way to get to the quest location in time or at the right time of day, auto fail. If the quests were replay able perhaps it wouldn't be so bad but as is, it is rather frustrating, especially when the quest relocation tends to put things in some odd out of the way location behind you or to the side of where you are actually going.

It is a great concept but just falls short with game play. It takes ages to load which put me off playing. There is stuff to do but you have to go out and find it, which in the current situation isn't ideal. I want a game I can play where I want to go and this has set tasks in set areas, so takes you where it wants you to go. It's not really the sort of game you can just play from home or at lunch in work and progress that much. (which is what I look for) I would say it needs a rethink.

title: Lost in Paradise:Waifu Connect
description:
‚ÄúLost in Paradise‚Äù is a casual card game featuring idle gameplay that saves you time in cultivating characters. Reap huge benefits effortlessly, no matter you‚Äôre eating, sleeping or working. Meet your destined waifus, win their favor through romantic dates and unfold unexpected stories with them. Leave all tedious tasks to the botting system, so you can focus on creating heartwarming moments with your girls~ With its interactive card cultivation and adventurous gameplay, coupled with adorable waifu lineups and unique idle-style exploration, ‚ÄúLost in Paradise‚Äù is bound to bring you a relaxing gaming experience like no others!


‚óÜ Collect Charming Waifus ‚óÜ 
Over 300 live 2D waifus that can interact and chat with you are for collection. Silky hair, fluttering skirt and euphonious voice -- everything of these adorable waifus is going to enchant you, carrying you off into an unimaginable world of excitement. 

‚óÜ Forge Bonds with Your Waifus ‚óÜ 
Interact with your waifus intimately! Spend time with these lovely ladies to learn more about them and unveil unique story content! They will even make sounds when you touch them~

‚óÜ Offline Idle Gameplay ‚óÜ 
Hands away but the game still progresses! Your waifus will fend against your enemies and yield plentiful rewards even when you are away from the game! 

‚óÜ Monster Breeding System ‚óÜ 
Hatch monsters and treat them with care. They'll turn into humanoids as they grow. 
Climb to a specific segment of the tower to unlock its respective monster. 

‚óÜ Free-to-Play VIP System ‚óÜ 
Upgrade your VIP status without shelling out a single cent! 
Earn tons of VIP EXP just by playing the game every day! 

‚óÜ Mini-games ‚óÜ 
Tons of rewarding mini-games are available for a myriad of gameplay experiences. Your time won‚Äôt be in vain while enjoying special and intimate moments with your waifus! 

Kindly note that is a free-to-play game but there are purchasable items in it. Feel free to set a password for item purchases in the settings of Google Play Store, if you want to disable this feature.
Additionally, this game requires an Internet connection for you to enjoy the fun.

We welcome any questions about the game, feel free to contact us anytime!

Support: https://www.eyougame.com/v2/contact

contentRatingDescription: Blood, Partial Nudity, Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol, Violence
comments: I have some connection issues where it takes me a few times loading the game to get it to log in correctly. Other than that the game is actually ridiculously generous. Not only are drop rates high but there is an entire crafting system for the strongest characters. And regular gameplay awards characters very easily. Honestly feel very good about dropping some money on this game.

The game is in no regards terrible, it just lacks focus, one critical part of a game is where it's focus lies. Each person enjoys a game fro their own reasons, usually for gameplay but to each their own. The lack of structure in the game is what keeps it back from what it could be, that and it needs to be a lot less busy, as it can be really messy figuring out what's what. Overall, art is solid, music is okay, the gameplay could very much use some polishing, and the UI even more so. 3/5 stars.

It's not bad at launch. The game needs more story, plot, and more interesting or meaningful interactions with the characters. There is an "early pay wall". Being very excited about this game, I invested $100, and vaulted over the pay wall. Once you complete about 75% of the "story line", you hit another hard "pay wall". Doing quick math, it would cost about $1000 to clear this, or a solid 4 to 6 months of grinding. Tons of mini games, what it needs is STORY to make grinding worthwhile.

Plays like a collection of mini-games and everything is surface-level. Lacks identity and focus; They're casting a wide net with the abundance of jarringly random themes and the game doesn't bother tying it into the nonstory or character building. For a better experience, accept the incongruences and enjoy the waifus... tho art alone won't tide the game over. Going forward I'd like to see in-depth waifu interaction/lore/customization, improved gear system, & content more strategic than CP checks

The negative reviews I keep seeing on this game are probably some of the silliest I've ever seen. The UI is not that complicated once you actually play the game. I also don't see how a game having MORE things to do is a bad thing? Yes they took elements from several other games but that's what I LOVE about it. The variety of things to do makes the game fun. It hasn't gotten boring yet. Plus the rewards are more than fair without pushing me to buy packs and premium currency. Within a day I had over 15K of premium currency without purchasing it. Honestly if you're letting negative reviews on this game push you away from trying it, don't. They really don't know what they're talking about and probably only played the game for 5 minutes before giving up. Seriously, I am already number 3 in my server and I've only just started. It's awesome!

description:
Sea Jurassic Tycoon is an idle tycoon simulator game to discover Jurassic ocean monster species.
You can get your pet underwater sea monsters to work, collect golds and build your virtual world of ocean monster species. Collect different species, make them bigger and stronger to go to battle.

Mine underwater gold, make money and build an empire to become the richest capitalist billionaire.

Features:
- Exciting sea monsters to unlock at every area and more species coming everyday

title: Offroad PRO - Clash of 4x4s
description:
Customize your rig. Feel the mud and dirt under the tires. Play with friends and compete with players all over the world. Show off your setup and explore the open world. 

MULTIPLAYER
Offroad PRO allows you to play with up to 8 players, to discover, compete or cooperate on a map of over 16 square miles. Feel like playing solo - we got you covered, you can do all the activities on your own. But trust us, once you get that rush of adrenaline while racing your rig against different players, it‚Äôd be hard to play solo again.

EXPLORE & EXPERIENCE
With one of the biggest and most detailed maps among all driving games on mobile devices, with over 500 off road activities hidden on the map, mud, dirt, ramps, lakes, rivers, hidden villages, observatory, sunken tanker and an old mine, Offroad PRO delivers countless hours of fun and addictive gameplay. Test your rig, discover hidden treasures, race in variety of off-road tracks or simply drive around and have fun with friends. Offroad PRO delivers real off road open world experience. On top of that we‚Äôve simulated real driving physics for each vehicle.

CUSTOMIZE
Offroad PRO is about customization as much as it is about driving cars and 4x4 trucks. Anyone, who ever dipped his toe in a real off-road activity knows, that you spend us much time in the garage twerking, fixing and tuning up your set-up as much as inside a driver's cabin on an off road track. So don‚Äôt worry - we got you covered. With several different vehicle classes such as ATV, UTV, quad, crawler, classic 4x4 jeep and special cars and trucks everyone will find a great setup to start with. Then comes the fun part - control damping, stiffness, travel and dozen more parameters,  swap suspension and engines, change tires, add lights, bullbars, roof racks and many more. Customize your looks by changing paints, adding vinyls, or grab a gas tank and camping gear on the roof. The options are countless, so build your rig now and show that you‚Äôre the real off road professional.

Note: If you choose to join as an Offroad PRO member, you are agreeing to an auto-renewing subscription plan that will automatically be charged every month through your account for $4.99. For Privacy Policy visit: http://mageeks.com For Terms and Conditions visit: http://mageeks.com

title: Zombie Origins: The Evil Village
description:
When evil forces were spreading in Europe at the end of the 19th century, the Black Order created monster zombies with witchcraft, aiming to rule to world. As a Survivor in the game, you will need to improve your strength, employ strategies, and ally with global players against zombies! Together we survive the apocalypse!

Game Features:

Upgrade Your Heroes
Recruit various heroes with unique skills and attributes, train and upgrade them to help you survive. Also, you can reset heroes to free yourself from worry about misspending resources.

Strategic Tower Defense
Choose your heroes wisely, deploy them at the right place, and find the best chance to release hero skills. Utilize your strategies to fight against the swarm of zombies! Stay safe!

Real-Time Combat
Control your troops to move on various terrains and join real-time combats. Note that these terrains will influence the marching route of your troops!

Alliance Territory
You cannot survive the zombie apocalypse alone! Seek like-minded players to form an alliance and have each other‚Äôs back in the apocalypse. You can also build and expand the territory of your alliance to gain more resources for survival!

The Mist & Airship
The whole world is shrouded in a strange mist created by the Black Order. You need to drive your airship to conquer the strongholds of the Black Order, dispel the mist and bring the whole world to the light again! You are the beacon of hope in the apocalypse!

Attention: Zombie Origins: The Evil Village is a free-to-play zombie war game, while some items and functions are available through in-game purchases. 

Note: This game requires an Internet connection.
Official Facebook Address: https://www.facebook.com/zombieorigins.evil

The whole world is shrouded in a strange mist created by the Black Order. You need to drive your airship to conquer the strongholds of the Black Order, dispel the mist and bring the whole world to the light again! You are the beacon of hope in the apocalypse!

title: Water & Fire Stickman 3D
description:
üî• Red and Blue will take you into an adventurous world where has many intriguing challenges waiting for you. This world adventure game belongs to puzzle game category with addictive gameplay. Red and Blue is a 4 button game, including jump button, navigation button, switch button and zoom button.
üî• Red and Blue game is based on the story of two characters in the stickman kingdom, known as fireboy and watergirl. On a beautiful day, fireboy and watergirl decided to go camping in the forest near their house. Unfortunately, they got lost and couldn't find the way back to their home sweet home. While looking for a way to escape, they accidentally met the king and queen of the stickman kingdom who were kidnaped.
üî• In stickman wallpaper, your mission is joining the enigma adventure and using clever strategy to help the boy and girl escape the forest. Simultaneously, you will become a warrior fighting to rescue king and queen from the carnage. There are many traps and must be overcome before they can be back home sweet home. You have to complete missions of the conundrum and maze puzzle.
 
üéÆ HOW TO PLAY üéÆ
-        Control the fireboy and watergirl to move with the navigation button.
-        Press the jump button to help the characters jump to a higher step.
-        Enlarge and shrink by using the zoom button.
-        Swap between red and blue with the switch button. Note that, boy and girl cannot move at the same time. If you swap to the boy, girl will freeze.
-        Look for the blue key and red key to open the corresponding colored doors. However, only fireboy can collect the red key, and the blue key belongs to watergirl.
-        The tips to unravel the maze puzzle faster are to pay attention to the stone or teleport doors. The teleport, stone and uncharted items are very useful to unravel the conundrum and maps.
-        The world adventure game also has special obstacles that only characters with the corresponding color can overcome such as lava, firepower, raven, bluefire and bluestar. Use parkour skills and be careful not to bruise!
-        In the arena, you need to nourish your combat stickman to fight monsters. Combat stickman should outlast as long as possible.
-        Don‚Äôt forget to earn gold and hearts.
-        Daily rewards, lucky spin and gift are waiting for you.
-        Not only have red and blue skin, but the characters could also change fig and cosplay many famous superheroes.
 
üåä GAME FEATURES üåä
1.     Beautiful graphic
-        The stickman wallpaper and impressive interface brings an excellent user experience.
2.     Unique items
-        There are many special items such as teleport and stone, unique obstacles for example firepower, bluestar, raven, lave and bluefire.
3.     Simple and addictive gameplay
-        4 game button with the task of finding the blue key and red key.
4.     Superhero cosplay
-        New figs will help watergirl and fireboy cosplay superheroes.

title: Shoot Bubble - Bubble Shooter Games & Pop Bubbles
description:
Shoot Bubble, classical bubble shooter game and poping all bubbles in each level.

Do you know how to crush bubbles?  
Find the bubbles of the same color, aim and shoot, you can eliminate all bubbles on the field. 
It is simple and easy to learn and quickly get started. There is no network requirement. 
You'll be addticed to shooting bubbles anytime and anywhere, suitable for players of any age.

Are you ready to enter the paradise of Bubble Shooter?
On the basis of the classic bubble gameplay, Shoot Bubble has many innovative gameplay, rich elimination gameplay and interesting crushing rules are waiting for you to discover. It has so many surprise activities to add color to your adventure!

GAMEPLAY
* Classic bubble elimination
Launch the bubbles through the aiming line, more than 3 bubbles of the same color can trigger the smashing effect, which is simple and easy to learn.

* Innovative gameplay with powerful props
There are also many fun and powerful props. Using props reasonably can help you pass the level faster.

* Interesting activities
Pass the levels, become the champion, and get the richest rewards

GAME FEATURES
- 3000+ fun and interesting levels, continuously updated
- Distinctive element design and new gameplay
- Dynamic decompression of crushing sounds and effects
- Rich daily rewards
- Fun activities give you a different experience
- Collect special items and stay first
- Continuous elimination to obtain powerful props
- Challenge the champion to win the biggest reward
- No internet required, you can play anytime, anywhere

Shoot Bubble, a casual game suitable for all ages and can be played in any environment, come and enjoy the leisure time.

comments: This game is almost an exact duplicate of "Bounce and Collect" from Voodoo. I have notified Voodoo of the potential intellectual theft. This game does not allow you to collect scores nearly as high as what you can in Bounce and Collect, and it shows an ad twice per level. It makes it almost impossible to play. I've played 100 levels and I've watched 200 ads. The ad loading makes the graphics in the game buggy.

Game doesn't know how to count... Cheats you out of what you're supposed to get .. too many ads.. ads popping up while trying to play a level and when trying to line up when you're getting ready to pour out the balls even when you just watched an ad less than 10 seconds before... Very poor..

There are an insane amount of ads. The game itself isn't necessarily fun but it is satisfying to play, the only thing dragging it down are the incessant ads. An option to turn them off would be most welcome, I'd pay a few bucks for it.
Ads the game. Levels take 20 seconds to complete, in the game interrupts you halfway through a level to show you an ad. Then when you complete the level you get rewarded with another ad.
My experience with this game is amazing because, this game is like an updated version of "Bounce and Collect".

title: Doggface: Skate and Stack
description:
Are you ready for the official Doggface skateboard game? Prepare to relax and go up as high as you can stacking your skateboard to the sky!

Play as Doggface and collect skateboard to get taller and avoid selfies,  obstacles, grind some rails and drink some juice all while riding your skateboard and race to the end! 

How far can you stack up your skateboard? These are games for all ages, and easy enough for a kid to beat. But maybe you'll need to be the smartest kid to beat this! Take your skateboard and get to the end! do you have what if takes to beat this fun run with Doggface?  

Who is this game for?

People that wanna relax! Have a break and play this free game now. A kid would love to play this! And so would adults! A skateboard game for all!


Want a break from the kid? 

Have them ride their skateboard here with Doggface in this fun run and ride that skateboard to victory!  Do you have the moves to beat all of the levels?  Play now and lets see! These games for you to pick up all of the skateboards!


How to play?

Swipe left or right to pick up a skateboard and get higher to get over the obstacles. Hit a sweet jump with your skateboard and collect coins!

Taking a break? 

Race your way through all of these levels with your skateboard with these game for a fun run. In this skateboard game you can grind rails, go off sweet jumps and get really tall!



If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at: hello@gamejam.co

Please note that our VIP Membership is an auto-renewing subscription!

Link to Terms and Conditions: https://gamejam.com/terms
Link to Privacy: https://gamejam.com/privacy
Link To Cookies Policy: https://gamejam.com/cookies-policy

title: Jewel Royal Garden: Match 3 gem blast puzzle
description:
Do you want to try out a fun Jewel 3 match game or miss the chance to enjoy it?

Have you heard that lots of jewels are hidden in the calm Royal Garden? The missions is to find the jewels and blast them all to collect the jewels. Blast away as many jewels as possible and as quickly as possible!

Jewel Royal Garden is a match 3 game that takes in the calm royal garden. Match various shapes of jewels to blast them to clear all the stages. Enjoy the bejeweled game with awesome high quality background. There are special items that have special abilities. Try out different special abilities and find out which one will help you solve the puzzle. New stages will be updated monthly, so you can play endless stages. Let's see who can beat all the puzzles.

[Play Method]
Move jewels and match at least three identical colored jewels.

[Game Features]
Numerous levels
- We have 500 stages with continuous updates.
Play game without entrance restrictions. You don't need data!
- There's no limit to the game such as lives, so you can play as much as you want!
- Play Offline, without Data (Internet) Connection!
- Don't worry about Wi-Fi!
Flashy graphics and simple manipulation
- It's an easy game to play if you can match 3 gems of the same color.
It's easy to learn, but not easy to master!
Low-Memory
- It's a low-memory game, so you can download it without any worry.

[Notice:]
1. If in-game does not save, the data will be initialized when the application is deleted.
The data is also initialized when the device is replaced.
2. It's a free app, but it includes in-game currency, items, and paid products such as removing advertisements.
3. Front, banner, and visual advertising.

title: Little Panda's Summer Travels
description:
Do you like traveling and exploring? Let's go! Travel around the world with Little Panda! Visit attractions across continents. Enjoy local customs with endless fun! 

EXPLORE FOUR COUNTRIES
Which countries would you like to visit? Enjoy sunbathing on the beach in Hawaii in the United States, see the beautiful cherry blossoms in Japan, or visit the rainforest in Brazil? And the mysterious Egyptian desert awaits you to explore! 

CELEBRATE LOCAL FESTIVALS
Don't miss the local festivals when visiting different countries! Try on the kimono and experience the traditional "Girls' Day" of Japan. Join the Brazilian Carnival and experience the float parade...Follow Little Panda and celebrate different festivals! 

CREATE ENDLESS STORIES
You can create all kinds of stories when traveling! Cook a delicious turkey with 13 ingredients. Choose lipsticks, eye shadows, and other cosmetics to dress up yourself as an Egyptian princess...Over 100 props for you to use! 

Kids, are you ready? Come and start your journey! 

FEATURES: 
- Characters from 15 different countries to accompany you for a good time. 
- Get to know 19 animal friends: Jaguars, piranhas, toucans, and more. 
- 16 kinds of cosmetics including lipsticks, eye shadows, and blushes for a beautiful makeup. 
- 20 kinds of featured costumes: Egyptian dress, Japanese kimono, samba dress, and more. 
- 13 kinds of ingredients including onions, broccoli, and tomatoes for cooking of a delicious turkey. 
- Over 100 props to help you create endless stories!

About BabyBus
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity,and designing our products through the kids' perspective to help them explore the world on their own.

Now BabyBus offers a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for over 400 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have released over 200 children's educational apps, over 2500 episodes of nursery rhymes and animations of various themes spanning the Health, Language, Society, Science, Art and other fields.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
Contact us: ser@babybus.com
Visit us: http://www.babybus.com

title: Brave Trials: West Legends
description:
Are you itching for an exhilarating online multiplayer RPG strategy experience in the Wild West? Join us and play as a courageous and intelligent bounty hunter in Brave Trials: West Legends! 

Take on a sheriff's duties as you chase after bounties and stand with Red Rock town in a conflict against the capitalists! Protect and develop the town, arm the townspeople with weapons, and expand your territory! Display your prowess as you defend against outside threats in this lawless land!

Unique points
Experience the Wild West as it once was in this broad and realistic world.

Amazing next-generation 3D art
Revel in the realistic Wild West map and the detailed building designs. Enjoy the story-filled character designs and console-game quality art on your phone.

Complete Bounties
Complete various bounties to earn your rewards. However, you'll end up in many situations where you'll be forced to make a decision. What type of person would you like to become in the Wild West?

Unique Battle Style
Experience various battle styles in the game! Each Hero troop will have their own unique skills when you're playing in normal stages. However, you'll get a new battle experience when it comes to large-scale gunfights, for that's when your Heroes will turn into commanders!

Experience various battle styles in the game! Each Hero troop will have their own unique skills when you're playing in normal stages. However, you'll get a new battle experience when it comes to large-scale gunfights, for that's when your Heroes will turn into commanders!
summary: Experience the Wild West and become a legend in this RPG strategy game!

title: Rampage : Giant Monsters
description:
Athena's space station, owned by NextDNA company, are working on a project that can revive prehistoric creatures and a virus can make these animals bigger. They need a place to test their work, so they sent these creatures including prehistoric animals that they had resurrected to earth, it was unexpected that these giant super beasts had extraordinary strength, we they are destroying the Earth and nothing can stop them.
With lots of giant beasts and simple, easy-to-play controls, you can lead these giant monsters, make them grow to conquer and reign over the Earth.

FEATURES:
+ Over 16 monsters to choose, upgrade by collecting more meat!
+ Campaign mode with 200 exciting levels will help you create epic moments.
+ Multiplayer mode with players around the world, show who is the king of monster.
Enjoy the most relaxing and satisfied feeling with Rampage: Giant Monsters."

title: Sortball Puzzle - Color Match Ball Sorting Game
description:
Sortball Puzzle - Color Match Ball Sorting Game is here for you! It's a fun and addictive colorful balls sorting game that's suitable for relaxing and sharpening your mind at the same time. Just tap the balls and sort the colored balls in the tubes until all the same colors are together in the same tube. This ball game is easy to learn but hard to master.

HOW TO PLAY SORTBALL PUZZLE - COLOR MATCH BALL SORTING GAME:
- Tap any tubes to pick a ball 
- Put it into a tube which contains the same color ball on the top if the tube has enough space, or empty tube.
- Stack all the balls with the same color into a single tube.
- Try not to get stuck! But you can undo the ball move by using the back function or restart the level anytime you want.

FEATURES OF SORTBALL PUZZLE - COLOR MATCH BALL SORTING GAME: 
- Easy to play but hard enough to exercise your brain
- One finger control. 
- Thousands of levels, can you pass all of them?
- New themes and background skin.
- NO penalties & time limits; you can enjoy the Sortball Puzzle anywhere you want. 
- All offline, no need for connection! Free for download!
- Suitable for all ages. Let's share this bubble sorting game for your friends and your family members to have a good time with them. 

What are you waiting for? Get ready for exploring a new bubble sorting game with colorful balls right now. You will enjoy the whole day long by playing this ball sorting color match game. Hopefully, This ball sort game will make your day become more interesting and colorful.

comments: I just started playing this game. I like it so far. I'm still playing this game. It has a variety of decorations and gives ya enough turns to actually play the game. Instead of draining my battery watching ads

By level 45, you have to watch ads for boosters to finish rounds. Still may not finish. Won coins don't increase with the cost of decorations so you are out of coin fast. Decoration choices, even the "best" ones you have to watch an ad for make no sense. Color, style, placement in the room, SMH. 2 college roomies rented a place and dropped dumpster cast offs wherever in the room. It's a match game, spend real $, watch ads from our sponsors on a "free" game. Not a decorating game. Uninstalling.

If this game is a "luxury" game, I'm Queen Elizabeth's sister! Right from the beginning, there was nothing "luxurious about it. And I found it quite boring. Pass on this one people. Unless you really like being bored!
I'm really enjoying playing this game. The challenges aren't difficult so there's very little frustration there. Just a nice, relaxing game to zone out to for a little while.
Lame! If you skip ads, you get double ads forced on you after each game. You also have to watch ads to get better decorating items. Poor programming imagination and manipulation of players.

title: Block Puzzle: Wood Winner
description:
Block Puzzle: Wood Winner is a wood style block game. Easy to play, but difficult to be a master. More wood blocks crush, more score you will get. Try it and you will love this block puzzle game.

How to play block puzzle:
- Place the WOOD pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.
- Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board, so be more careful.

Features of the block puzzle:
- Hours of fun, exciting to play.
- It has all features of great puzzle block game.
- Innovation of classic brick and block puzzle game.
- No time limits.
- Totally free and classic wood block puzzle.
- You can play anytime and anywhere! 

We really hope you enjoy it!
Join more than 1 million lovers of the wonderful wood block game and become the real master!

title: Idle Hero Battle - Dungeon Master
description:
Welcome to Idle Hero Battle. Join our hero's adventure in Bestia, a once happy and peaceful little town turned dark. Undead bosses are now crowding the streets under King Richie's iron fist. But this will end now! Stock up on epic hero powers to start the battle of the century today!


Unlock your potential and learn new skills to battle the zombies while exploring all the possibilities of this new and exciting action idle hero game!


Grab your weapons and friends to join this exciting fantasy idle RPG adventure now! You will find it full of opportunities to battle fierce enemies, unlock skills, and power up your hero to the max! Grow stronger, every day and battle the undead bosses of Bestia in this Idle Hero Battle!


‚òÖ Explore, hunt & grow
Tons of different monsters and bosses are waiting for you in the dungeons! Go into training to prepare yourself, challenge them to a battle and show off your fighting skills!

‚òÖ Unique weapons
Collect, try and master all four types of weapons to make your hero invincible! Become the hero of your time!

‚òÖ Equipment collection
With tons of amazing equipment and costumes, there is something for everyone! Use runes, gems, relics, and skins to create your unique character!

comments: If you're going to have it auto battle, it needs to be smarter.. it dashes the skills away from the most enemies, sometimes towards nothing.. as it stands now, I'm not even going to play this game if I have to constantly manually move the guy back towards enemies. Also, sometimes he seems to just stop attacking if all skills are on cooldown. Maybe you should make a different kind of game, you're not very good at making an idle game.

This is without a doubt the funnest idle game I've played, however it's not a full idle game. While offline, you don't progress pass your max stage that you've reached. Which I was okay with that at first but since I'm at stage 500 something it feels like I don't do that much dmg, so it takes a while to progress while playing. So it'd be nice if my character could progress without the game having to be open.

I just started and iv already encountered a technical issue/ bug that's downed me 2k gems outside of that an maybe it's because I'm just not late game yet but early game you literally cannot die even if you tried. I really wanted to like this game. Iv played so many idlers an never had one go bad this fast for me. 3 stars, 1 feels good, 2 I liked the writing an where it was going, an 3 love the art style I can see it working. Where can i submit a real bug report for your game?

Good game easy to grind enough and progress. But becomes too stale too quickly after a few days ( roughly 24 hours of non stop ). Need more exciting modes and ways to get equipment. Bosses in dungeons are now way to easy one shotting them and the drops are not good enough to progress. Overall game is very fun and easy to understand. But the amount of modes man it become easily something quick to drop however lots of room for potential I'm sure we will soon see in future updates !!!

This is by far one of the best mobile games I've played in over 10 years, even the auto battle AI plays well. The skill animations, the skills themselves, weapon swapping, overall animation of the game, its all really good work. Keep it up, this is worth the effort you people have put into it.

comments: Pretty awesome, Totally different, but! It's gonna get boring real quick. There are pages for what looks like gear, quests and a store, but they're dead. I thought they would unlock as my level in the game progressed, but here I am at level 12 and stage 10 and nothing has unlocked. Usually the game will let you know at what stage/lvl a feature will unlock, nothing. So far I earn gold to upgrade attributes, that's it. Love the concept, but it needs work.

It has moderate game play, but the control is abysmal. This desperately needs the ability to adjust sensitivity because it doesn't control well at all. I shouldn't need to swipe multiple times just to reach the side of the screen.

Amazing game. 3 star review because no equipment available yet it seems, and makes the game very 2D because of that. The damage given compared to health received on lvl ups/upgrade is off balance as well. Maybe once equipment is available this will be more balanced.
The gameplay is fun and the style is similar to other games. However, the dialogue sometimes doesn't make sense. Also, why is the devil chased our dragon and rider?
The game is pretty fun. I really like the looks and the idea of it. It certainly needs more "things" yet it's fun.

title: Trivia Master - Quiz Puzzle & Trivia Offline Game
description:
Trivia Master is an exciting trivia & quiz offline game. You can answer variety of fun questions to train your brain and expand your knowledge. It is totally free, easy to play and makes learning fun.

Trivia Master is designed for trivia addicts and quiz heads. We select variety of fun questions from many categories including: movies, music, sports, food, celebrities, animals, brands, nature, science, society, history, geography, and more.

Are you smart enough to win?
Just download and start your quest now!

‚òÜ  HOW TO PLAY  ‚òÜ

‚ñ∫ Choose the correct answer from 4 options before time runs out.

‚ñ∫ Try a HINT to help you remove a wrong option if you get stuck.

‚ñ∫ Use +20s to add 20 seconds if you want more time.

‚ñ∫ Answer 3 questions correctly to pass a level.

‚ñ∫ Pass levels to win bonus coins for props.

‚ñ∫ You will get a mysterious picture every time you complete 4 levels.

Trivia Master starts easy and gets harder as you level up. More and more fun trivia questions and levels will be added continuously. How far can you go?

title: Solitaire Dragons
description:
Solitaire Dragons is a fantastic solitaire card game for you with a marvelous Dragon theme. Based on the solitaire card games, it is true to the spirit of classic solitaire game (also known as Patience or Klondike) and it will help you to train your brain.

Solitaire Dragons will take you to the magical world of the medieval island. You could play with the witch to go on adventures and encounter various kinds of dragons in the world of sword and magic. What‚Äôs more, you could create your paradise by collecting dozens of dragons there, for instance, torridity, foliage, aster, lava dragon, obsidian dragon, etc. It is not merely a solitaire game that makes your brain smart and active, however also a challenge for you to know more about the dragon and get along well with them in the game. Come with the witch and try the FREE solitaire game NOW!

- CREATIVE SOLITAIRE GAME
Based on the classic solitaire game (also known as Patience or Klondike), we've added a CREATIVE dragon world with different Medieval Creatures for you.

- UNEXPECTED SURPRISE IN DRAGON EGGS
Whenever you get a new dragon egg, you don't know what the dragon inside is. Let the witch use magic to speed up hatching. Get more kinds of dragons from dragon eggs!

- DELICATELY DESIGNED THEMES
Put your hatched dragons into the Dragon Island and let them grow up naturally, they will provide you with magic to purify the lifeless habitat, so you can decorate the Dragon Island more beautifully!

- THOUSANDS OF CHALLENGES
Together with Daily Challenges, there are over tens of thousands of classic solitaire challenges for you to play anytime and anywhere!

CONTACT US
Please send your feedback by email to 
 support@pbstudio.freshdesk.com

If you enjoy playing Patience or Klondike solitaire games, it is inevitably the GREAT classic solitaire games for you on mobile devices! You can train your brain and share with it friends and family members! And if you also like dragons, don't hesitate to download and play this classic solitaire game NOW!

title: Cocobi Summer Vacation - Kids
description:
Who doesn't love summer vacation?
Enjoy the warm sun, sandy beach, and cool waters.
Go on a vacation with the Cocobi family for a summer holiday!

‚ñ† Exciting activities and water sports at the beach!
- Tube Racing : Let‚Äôs go! Swim and race with mom and dad!
- Underwater Adventure : Dive into the ocean and save sea animals.
- Surfing Game : Surf on the waves. Don‚Äôt fall off the wobbly surfing board!
- Sand Play : Mom and dad are buried in the sand. Tickle them and draw on their faces! Make sandcastles too!
- Baby Animal Rescue : Baby sea animals are stuck on the sandy beach. Help and guide them back into the ocean.

‚ñ† Discover special summer vacation experiences!
- Cocobi Hotel : Take a bubble bath and order room service.
- Local Market : Have fun at the local market and buy exotic fruits.
- Beach Ball : Play ball and hit the fruits. A monkey might try to block the ball!
- Shopping : Pick out cute outfits for Coco and Lobi.
- Food Truck : There are so many delicious choices. Order and make fresh juice, ice cream, and hotdogs.

‚ñ† About KIGLE
KIGLE creates fun games and educational apps for kids. We service free games for kids from 3 to 7 years old so kids of all ages can play and enjoy our kids' games.Our kids' games promote curiosity,creativity,memory, and concentration in children. KIGLE's free games also include popular characters like Pororo the Little Penguin,Tayo the Little Bus, and Robocar POLI.We create apps for children all around the world,hoping to provide kids with free games that will help them learn and play.

‚ñ† Hello Cocobi
Hello Cocobi is about a special dinosaur family.Coco is the brave older sister and Lobi is the little brother full of curiosity.Follow their special adventure on the dinosaur island.Coco and Lobi live with their mom and dad, and also with other dinosaur families on the island.Let‚Äôs travel to the island of Cocobi where dinosaurs are living peacefully and happily together.The dinosaur characters and stories are for girls and for boys.There is a special dinosaur for everyone to love,even a T-Rex family! 
‚ñ† Summer beach vacation games for kids with Cocobi full of fun free games!

The little dinosaurs‚Äô fun summer holiday on the beach!

Beachside Cocobi Hotel.
- Have a bubble bath and a massage at the Cocobi Hotel spa.The hungry dinosaurs want to eat! Choose the pasta,burger,chicken,or soup! 

Shop for fruits at the local market with the little dinosaurs!
- There are instruments,souvenirs,and vegetables.But the dinosaurs must buy fruits to eat for a fruit party! 

Monkey vs. Fruits! Hit the fruits with the beach ball!
- Gather bananas,mangoes,and coconuts to make fruit juice with a fun beach ball game.A monkey might try to hit the ball back! 

The tube swimming competition
 - Who will win the swimming game?Win first place to collect stickers!

Deep ocean underwater adventure
- Explore the ocean and help turtles and dolphins caught in nets.Watch out for electric eels and baby sharks.There is a mermaid and a giant whale too! 

A wobbly surfing adventure
- Balance the surfing board on the wave.Who will be the best surfer?

Dance with awesome outfits
- The store has amazing clothes.Wear pineapple and octopus outfits, then it's dance party time! 

Fun sand play with sandcastles
- Make and decorate cool sandcastles!
- Mom and dad are sleeping in the sand.Let's decorate them into a mermaid or a funny crab.

Cocobi Baby Sea Animal Rescue Team!
- Baby sea animals are stuck on the sand.Help them get back into the ocean!

"Something smells delicious!"
Choose a menu and cook on the food truck
- Juice,ice cream, hotdogs!There are so many snacks on the food truck!The little dinosaurs will love to eat them!

Play fun summer vacation games and collect stickers!
- Choose a background to decorate with stickers.Collect all the stickers and create your own Cocobi story!

- Fun games that kids can play on a summer holiday are waiting for you on the Cocobi Summer Vacation game for kids.It's filled with games kids love!

title: Art Puzzle 2021
description:
Art Puzzle 2021 is a free game for all, to relax from stress, to stimulate the brain. 

Enjoy this amazing puzzle game recomposing your best photos. 

You can take picture from both camera and gallery.

It's a game for all children, adults, students etc.

Art Puzzle 2021 app game have 3 levels :
1. Easy(3x4)
2. Medium (4x4)
3. Hard(5x5)

Features of Art Puzzle 2021 :
- Take photo from camera and gallery 
- Scores
- Replace photo position
- Refresh puzzle
- Hint
- Sound on or off
- Levels
- Share app
- More app
- Rate us

You can play with selected photos from your gallery or photos taken from camera.

After complete puzzle set photos as wallpaper.

title: Dark Riddle 2 - Story mode
description:
The sequel of a well-known story in our universe is waiting for you. However, this time, we have prepared multiple small missions and puzzles with separate plots. You are about to enjoy new mechanics like driving a car or a tractor, chasing crabs, delivering parcels to the neighbors, lifting items with the help of a gravitational gadget, etc. Besides, we have introduced new characters to the game.

New chapters will appear every month. The stories will become funnier and more exciting.

This is a first-person adventure thriller with an interactive environment and interesting quests. Solve puzzles and uncover the secrets of a suspicious neighbor who lives across from you.

Your adventure begins in an unusual city where you can find many useful and unique items. You will meet a police officer and a seller of alien devices, and during the game you will get acquainted with unusual creatures. Each item and character creates a huge fascinating story. 


This is a free game, but some items and abilities can also be bought for real money. It can make it easier for you to complete and add new experiences.

If you have any questions or suggestions for the game, please contact support.

title: Little Elves - Growth Paradise
description:
Welcome to the dreamy and sweet world of elves, 
play various interesting interactive objects with the elves, take care of these elves and collect them all!

Hatch & Collect
Not only can you use gold coins to buy elf eggs, you can also put two cute elves into the magical incubator to get a new elf egg!

Play Fun Games
Not only are they the cutest virtual Pokemon, but they are also very good at games! Rocket flying and jumping mini games, earn rewards and get super cute interactive gifts!

Take Care Of  Elves
You need to take good care of your virtual elves! Feed them and make them happy: play more interactive and interesting objects!
They will also have talking and emoticons, so everyone can understand their virtual elves!

Elf Fashion Dress Up
You can put on a stylish dress for the cute virtual elves! In a large number of cool glasses, hats, etc., turn them into real elf fashionistas.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the dreamy and sweet world of elves,
play various interesting interactive objects with the elves, take care of these elves and collect them all!

Hatch & Collect
Not only can you use gold coins to buy elf eggs, you can also put two cute elves into the magical incubator to get a new elf egg!

Play Fun Games
Not only are they the cutest virtual Pokemon, but they are also very good at games! Rocket flying and jumping mini games, earn rewards and get super cute interactive gifts!

Take Care Of Elves
You need to take good care of your virtual elves! Feed them and make them happy: play more interactive and interesting objects!
They will also have talking and emoticons, so everyone can understand their virtual elves!

Elf Fashion Dress Up
You can put on a stylish dress for the cute virtual elves! In a large number of cool glasses, hats, etc., turn them into real elf fashionistas.
summary: Care for cute & fluffy pets!

title: Friday Funny Mod Ugh (Tankman)
description:
Friday Funny Mod Ugh (Tankman) is a popular mod for Friday Night Funkin (FNF).
In this application you have to play as a tank driver. The tank captain is a stern soldier who has seen everything in his life.

Friday Funny Mod Ugh Tankman FNF offline is a simple but very addicting game. Using four buttons, you need to create your own unique hit to the music of Tankman.
Compete with your friends, show the best result.

Leave your feedback, I will try to take into account all the comments and suggestions in the next version of Friday Funny Mod Ugh Tankman 2

title: Bird Rush: Match 3 puzzle game
description:
Welcome to Bird Rush - Match 3 puzzle game!

Get ready for an exciting adventure for the whole family in this puzzle game with funny birds! Hundreds of interesting match 3 levels with unique puzzles! Match birds of the same color to clear the lawn and help clear up the mess in the forest!
Become a puzzle genius and pump your brain and logical thinking as much as possible!

Your path will go through many locations, with its own characteristics and inhabitants: colorful jungle, mysterious forest, mysterious city, wild west, dark tombs and much more! Overcome the difficulty of the puzzle and explore all of them!

Show your strategic thinking! The birds need your help on this adventure! Launch birds of the same color in a row to traffic and move further through interesting puzzle levels.

üèÜ Here are some of the awesome features of the game: üèÜ

‚òÖ New unique match 3 gameplay!
‚òÖ Puzzles that are able to amaze you throughout the game!
‚òÖ Hundreds of challenging match 3 levels: tons of fun with unique boosters and explosive combinations!
‚òÖ Diverse and colorful locations!
‚òÖ Modern and unmatched graphics!
‚òÖ Can be played with the whole family!

title: Coin Blossom
description:
Welcome to the world of Survival W.I.N!
You can be the next "COIN RICH"!
Join the Survival W.I.N contest by the "Queen Rich" Committee.
Collect Coins and build buildings for a chance to win!

‚òÖ Spin the flower stand and get Coins!
 Spin the slots on the puzzle board to get Coins! 
 Flowers are hiding various blocks such as Attack and Raid blocks.

‚òÖ Attack and raid your competitors!
- Use the Attack Card to attack your competitors and get lots of Coins.
- Throw bombs at your competitors' buildings to attack them.
- Go on raids to steal Coins from competing "COIN RICH"s.
- Play the Coin Jackpot Roulette in Raid mode.

‚òÖ Play with cute pets!
- Finally, you can play the game with cute pets!
- Your pet will run around the spinning puzzle board, making your game all the more fun!
- More content will be unlocked, depending on your Town Level.

‚òÖ Have fun decorating your Towns!
- Build different-themed Towns.
- Decorate your mission areas, including the beautiful Flower Shops and Towns.

‚Äª This game requires an internet connection.

title: What's your Hidden Power? Super Power Anime Game
description:
‚ñ†Synopsis‚ñ†

With rumors from your past forcing you into a life of solitude, your lonely days show no signs of changing.

Even the entrance ceremony for your new high school holds no appeal‚Äîpromising three more years of exactly the same isolation and bullying you were victim to all through middle school‚Ä¶ Until someone sees you for who you truly are.

Dragged into a world you never thought you‚Äôd see as part of a top secret club, this is your chance to finally find a place where you belong!

‚ñ†Characters‚ñ† 

Meet Lina

The cheerful leader of the Future Club who refuses to take ‚Äòno‚Äô for an answer, Lina has decided to take you under her wing. No matter where you go and what you do, Lina‚Äôs there to lend you a gentle, guiding hand. 

With a quick wit and sharp eye, it won‚Äôt be long until you‚Äôre by her side! 

Meet Rikku 

Your quiet, soft-spoken classmate, Rikku happens to have more in common with you than you realize‚Ä¶  

Haunted by her past and afraid of what might happen if she shows everyone her true abilities, Rikku tends to keep to herself. But when the two of you are standing side by side, can you give her the courage to face the world?

Meet Kira

Strong in mind and body thanks to years of kendo, Kira‚Äôs been by your side since you were both little. Now that you‚Äôre back in town after years away, she wants to rekindle the friendship you once shared‚Ä¶ 

But how will she react when the secret you‚Äôve been hiding is revealed?

comments: Yet another great story by Genius. The story is more focused on all of the character's growth which is a nice change of pace. I enjoyed all the characters & their contribution to the story. If I were to choose a favorite, I'd have to choose Kira. Loved everything about her. From her white hair & purple eyes to her dedication to the MC she is 100% Best Girl :) Thanks again Genius & as always keep up the great work.

I gotta say, this is very fun. I'm not quite done with it just yet, but I can say with confidence that it is excellent. If you overlook the hard to get points and tickets, it's great. Also, if you guys are looking for more things to do, I've got a couple basic suggestions: something in space, like Star Trek-ish and also something like a mech pilot academy or something...? Personally, I think it could be quite nice to see that kind of stuff, but that's just my opinion...

I love how you can pick your power it makes the game a lot more interesting because you actually get to pick what you would want in this situation. I hope you make more games like this. The only thing I dislike is waiting time for the ad since it only give 30 coins.

The game is great. But I wish you guys would make the mini games a bit easy. We don't mind watching ads. It is really hard to play the current mini games. So please make it a bit easy. ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏èüòä

title: Carnival Games
description:
Welcome to the carnival fair! Are you ready to play the best fun fair games for free?

Senior Games brings you this collection of cool carnival games for hours of entertainment. In it you will find the typical amusement park games: balloon and dart game, the boxing arcade machine, the jar shooting game, skeeball and many more! 

You will have to have a good aim and be as fast as possible to win the infinite levels of the game. With each victory you will get tickets to use in the teddy machine, which of the adorable toys will you catch first? The more carnival games you win, the more tickets you will get to exchange in the teddy picker and you will be able to get a great collection of stuffed animals.   

The classic carnival games are simple and have intuitive designs. They can be enjoyed by people of all ages, from the youngest to senior players or older people who want to have fun and stimulate skills such as attention or visual perception.

TYPES OF GAMES

- Darts: throw the darts and pop as many balloons as possible.
- Boxing: press the button quickly to gain strength and hit the exact position to get a good score when hitting the punching bag.
- Skeeball: throw the ball by controlling the direction and strength to score a lot of points.
- Shooting: aim at the moving target and shoot to hit it.  
- Jars: throw the ball at the jars to make them fall and win the game.

GAME FEATURES 

- Different fun and fast mini-games
- For all ages
- Totally free

ABOUT SENIOR GAMES - TELLMEWOW
Senior Games is a project of Tellmewow, a mobile game development company specialized in easy adaptation and basic usability, which make our games ideal for older people or young people who simply want to play an occasional game without major complications.
If you have any suggestions for improvement or want to stay informed about upcoming games that we are going to publish, follow us on our social networks.
@seniorgames_tmw

title: Queendom
description:
Take on the role of a young Queen in medieval Europe in "Queendom", a story-driven dress-up game. Mix and match exquisite outfits and visit various royal courts, recruit confidants to your side, and engage in a thrilling romance with various partners. Experience a world of fantasy, navigate your way through schemes and power plays, and create your very own Kingdom!

‚Äî‚Äî Game Features ‚Äî‚Äî

‚òÜ Make Your Choices ‚òÜ
Deal with various conspiracies and romantic encounters, and navigate through power struggles and court politics. How will you choose to handle such scenarios? Enter a world of fantasy filled with breathtaking graphics and create your own legend!

‚òÜ Transform into a Stunning Queen ‚òÜ
Collect countless exquisite gowns and accessories! Mix-and-match and customize your outfits to your heart's desire. Show off your unparalleled beauty and become the belle of the ball!

‚òÜ Date Various Partners ‚òÜ
Go on romantic outings and heart-pounding dates with various partners in this medieval fantasy. Who will catch your fancy and win your favor?

‚òÜ Recruit Confidants ‚òÜ
You need allies to regain your throne! Gain the trust of wise astronomers, charming bards, shrewd politicians, and powerful pirates to serve your cause. Your wish is their command!

‚òÜ Train Pets and Interact Online ‚òÜ
Tame horses and raise cats to alleviate your stress. Go online to matchmake your pets!
Chat with friends and form alliances with other Queens! How will you rank among your fellow Queens?

‚òÜ Rise to Power ‚òÜ
Do you have the courage and wisdom to handle court affairs, solve conspiracies, and defeat your enemies? Transform from a young heir to a powerful queen with trusted allies. Can you bear the weight of the crown?

Develop romantic relationships, vie against your foes, tend to the garden, collect antiques... countless exciting features await! Discover sweet romance and courtly schemes, and immerse yourself in this charming medieval fantasy!

=== Information ===
[Official Facebook]: https://www.facebook.com/QueendomGlobal
[Official Instagram]: https://www.instagram.com/QueendomGlobal

title: Fission Ball
description:
Fission Ball is a very interesting casual game. In the game, you can launch the ball through the barrel. The ball can pass through doubled items, swallowed items, and subtracted items to increase or decrease the ball. Your ultimate goal is to break the obstacle at the end point. If the obstacle at the end point drops to 0, then you will pass the level. Come and try.

How to play:
1. Move the barrel left and right
2. The ball will be launched automatically
3. When encountering multiple items, it will be doubled
4. When encountering swallowed items, it will disappear 
5. When encountering subtraction items, it will also disappear
6. Encountering obstacles at the end will reduce the number
7. If the number of obstacles at the end drops to 0, pass the level

Game features:
1. Lots of unique levels
2. Cool art design
3. Smooth experience
4. The ball full of screen, uncompress and relax
5. Free games

We are looking forward to getting feedback from all of you! Please leave your reviews, so we can keep making the¬†game¬†even better.

FEATURES:

‚öà 170 beautifully designed cards featuring fascinating characters from 10 different factions. Over 20 unique abilities and a sophisticated upgrade system with 10 tiers and 100 levels.

‚öà Explore a stunning fantasy world with 20 map locations üè∞ and 180+ stages. Choose from 4 levels of difficulty for tcg novices or master strategists.

 ‚öà Battle your way through a card game campaign of over 600 quests, as well as 10  Special Events featuring original modes to ensure you‚Äôre never lacking an exciting challenge.

Gather your heroes üõ°Ô∏è and start your epic adventure in this turn-based rpg that‚Äôs guaranteed to thrill fans of strategic card games.

title: Lords of Coins
description:
Travel through time and magical lands fighting your enemies! Attack other players‚Äô islands and raid their fortune! Defend your island against incoming attacks and earn more coins! This game is all about the art of earning coins and investing them to get more coins and spins! Lords of Coins is a slot-based game where you are in charge of building fascinating new worlds!

Want to become rich and powerful? Time to get your hands on some treasure! Gather all your coins, together with your friends, and become Lords of Coins! Build your own island on good fortune, attacks and raids! It‚Äôs fun and simple! Simply spin the slot, win, or, if you are lucky, hit the jackpot, and build through compelling island adventures!

Explore the story!

A funny professor crashed his ship. He doesn‚Äôt know where he is or what year it is! Travel through time, exploring the history of the world, art, music, culture, and science. With Lords of Coins, you are bound to have fun! Do you have what it takes to be the ultimate Lord of Coins?

Build and upgrade!

Any island settlement costs coins to build. Use the coins that you collect from the slot machine to build and upgrade buildings on your island! Why will Lords of Coins have you coming back for more? Because as soon as you complete one settlement, a new, fun island construction already awaits you! Earn coins and spend them on building different islands!

Spin the slot machine!

To earn coins, spin the slot machine that gives a special prize! You can also attack and raid other players‚Äô islands to win even more coins, shields, and amazing rewards. Make sure you have enough spins available.

Choose your own path!

Only you decide where to travel to next on your adventure and what to explore further! But the goal remains the same ‚Äì collect heaps of coins and keep upgrading your island!

Raid & Attack islands!

Can you guess where the greatest reward is hidden? Go and check it out! You can also get coins by raiding and attacking other players in the area. Visit their islands, collect all the hidden treasures and ruin their islands!  But watch out that your enemies don‚Äôt exact revenge and raid your island, too!

Defend your island!

The path to becoming a coin genius is through raids and attacks! But vengeful raiders never sleep! Keep your guard up and defend your island from being attacked! Keep your guard to be number one in this awesome game!

Exact revenge on your enemies!

You cannot forgive those who ruin your island! It‚Äôs pay back time! Prove your strategic abilities and always stay one step ahead of your friends in Lords of Coins!

Compete against your friends!

Let‚Äôs be honest, it‚Äôs more fun to play against your friends! Connect to Facebook to compete with your friends in Lords of Coins! Who will be the next Time Lord?

Complete the collection!

Collect and trade statues with friends, and be the first to finish the collection to win amazing rewards!

Collect all the puzzle pieces and complete the puzzle collection by upgrading the special upgrade on each island! 

Looking for a simple but fun game where you steal your friends‚Äô resources to build your own island? Look no further! Lords of Coins is a must-have game for you! Start your amazing journey today! Choose your own path to travel through time and decide which way to go next! Join the professor, help him uncover the challenging mystery and understand the hidden secrets of the past! Be wise and brave, making money by attacking and raiding friends‚Äô and other players‚Äô islands, or even by pure luck! The more you play, the better Lord of Coins you are going to be!
