title: My Dog - Puppy Game Pet Simulator
description:
Game Features
‚Ä¢	Puppy raising simulation game
‚Ä¢	Adopt and take care of your favorite puppy
‚Ä¢	64+ breeds of dogs
‚Ä¢	Play with your friends by visiting their homes
‚Ä¢	Try fun games to keep your puppy happy
‚Ä¢	Take great AR pictures with your puppy

My Dog is a simulation game where you can feed, train, play, and dress up your favorite puppies. After choosing among more than 70 unique dogs, you can design your home from a variety of furniture, decoration, and layouts. Then, you can invite or visit your friends to socialize with other puppies at home.  

Instead of describing the main features, we want to share with you the story behind the development of this game. This story came from the creator of My Dog:

‚ÄúAlthough I have participated in the development of several games, I have not been as excited with a new game as with My Dog because this game brings back a lot of good memories. 

When I was little, my parents adopted a puppy that lived with us for longer than fifteen years. I still remember our first interaction; he could fit in my palm. As a child, I became his owner and did my best to take care of him. From an early age, I gained this sense of responsibility because of him but also developed a strong feeling of sympathy towards the dog community. I decided not to have another puppy after him because I knew it would be difficult to experience this absence again in the future. 

At university, I kept thinking of ways to bring my puppy back to me by using technology. However, it was not until recently that I formed a dedicated team of engineers and artists to develop My Dog. I hope that players can raise their favorite puppy while bringing him everywhere with them, creating good memories.

If you find this story interesting, want to share your own story, or enjoy playing our game, please send us an email games@boltrend.com. We hope that My Dog help reunites dog owners with his beloved friends and help our puppies find a loving family. Follow us on social media to get the latest updates.

developerAddress: 1/F XIU PING COMM BLDG 104 JERVOIS ST SHEUNG WAN HONG KONG
comments: The game is very beautiful, but the gameplay is a bit lacking. Several minigames, a stroll and a battle system, gets repetitive quickly. Very few customisation options, and each is very expensive. Free players can only earn one diamond per day, but to get a new puppy, it costs from 24 to 800 diamonds.

The game was running fine... Coins are hard to earn but it's reasonable... But everything has changed after the July 19th update! After the update, the dog food, water, shampoo, and all the toys are now costing 1,000 coins instead of 100 coins! Omg! I don't think I can afford this any more! My dogs will die from hunger and thirst!

Super cute game! I love being able to interact with friends and have so many fun things to do. The only things I think would really improve the game is less waiting time for things such as dog pregnancy, a way to give/trade dogs with friends, more clothing options, and a better way to get gems other than watching 5 ads for one.

Game was fine until you increased the puppy due time to ovet 110 hours! Reverse this now! And please either make coins easier to get or reduce the prices on alk items! And I would really like to see everything that costs gems have a secondary coin price added. So I have a choice to buy with either gems or coins. Also i am sick and tired of seeing that constant post spam on my screen. And when i turn it off I also cannot speak to my friends in personal messages. Please fix this

I like it, It's a good dog simulation. But like most things in the world it has it's cons. 1. Everything so expensive (Cash Grab). 2. Glitches. 3. Ridiculous pregnancy time. A glitch I ran into was if u DM someone then unadd them and delete the chat, it'll continuously say someone messaged you when no one has. Expenses should be brought down. Pregnancy should last 3-5 days not 5-7. U should only need an adoption card for IF someone gifts u a dog's code NOT if your dog had a pup.

title: Twin Tiles - Tile Connect Game
description:
Warning! Only 5% of people can pass the first five levels of such board games without losing. Can you do the same?

Twin Tiles is a match game for memory training and relaxation. And of course, the process is really fun! Having stress at work? Tired of constant learning at university or school? Get rid of that stress and relieve the tension while having fun in this tile game!

In addition to that good time you‚Äôll have, the tile puzzle will also train your memory, so you can perform better at any mental activity after it. Tile matching is really good for your brain!

Join us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/twintiles_game/
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TwinTiles.game

How to play matching games?

Don't worry, it's really easy to play Twin Tiles. You need to connect tiles with the same pictures on them. The tile match mechanic is intuitive and simple but there are still some interesting things about it. Here are some important rules:

- Match two tiles with similar pictures on them. After the correct matching, each pair found will be instantly removed from the playing field. You can‚Äôt merge tiles that are too far away from each other or have other tiles between them.
- Clear the field to pass the level. Each new level brings new challenges, so keep practicing to become a tile master.
- You fail in the scenario when you are out of time. There's a timer upfront on the screen, so pay attention to the amount of time left. Try to match tiles as fast as you can!
- There‚Äôs such an obstacle as the bomb. These can be spawned anywhere on the game field and make it really difficult to pass the level. Especially when you ignore it!
- Different tiles reward you with a different number of points. To get the highest score possible, try to find all possible pairs within the time limit.

Let‚Äôs add some power!

Twin Tiles has its own unique feature combination that you won‚Äôt find in any similar mahjong games! Most popular mahjong titles, such as Mahjong Solitaire, don‚Äôt have any special tricks or power-ups. We, on the contrary, do!

- Hint. Need a clue? Here it comes! This ability finds the nearest pair and highlights it. Works until any pair is merged correctly. Sometimes even a match master needs a bit of advice!
- Shuffle. This power-up changes the positions of all tiles at once. It can be really useful when you're stuck and can't find a single pair. Mind games can be tricky, so don‚Äôt hesitate to use shuffle when you need it!
- Theme changer. Hard to connect blocks with those types of pictures on them? Use the changer! It swaps all the pictures on your tiles to make the tile connect easier. This effect fades off with the completion of the current level or any type of game exit.
- Wand. Use this power-up to match any tile with a bomb. Can save your level during the hottest scenarios. Unavailable if no bombs were spawned on the playing field.

Get ready for some fun!

We know how fun match games are. That's why we're creating the best matching games possible! Feel free to download our puzzle games and share them with your friends and relatives. Remember ‚Äì tiles connect players from all over the world!

Our free matching games are constantly improving. We hope that our tile games will bring something new for everyone. Stay connected to get the best brain-training experience with our vivid and modern logic games!

- Match two tiles with similar pictures on them. After the correct matching, each pair found will be instantly removed from the playing field. You can‚Äôt merge tiles that are too far away from each other or have other tiles between them.
- Clear the field to pass the level. Each new level brings new challenges, so keep practicing to become a tile master.
- You fail in the scenario when you are out of time. There's a timer upfront on the screen, so pay attention to the amount of time left. Try to match tiles as fast as you can!
- There‚Äôs such an obstacle as the bomb. These can be spawned anywhere on the game field and make it really difficult to pass the level. Especially when you ignore it!
- Different tiles reward you with a different number of points. To get the highest score possible, try to find all possible pairs within the time limit.

Let‚Äôs add some power!

Twin Tiles has its own unique feature combination that you won‚Äôt find in any similar mahjong games! Most popular mahjong titles, such as Mahjong Solitaire, don‚Äôt have any special tricks or power-ups. We, on the contrary, do!

- Hint. Need a clue? Here it comes! This ability finds the nearest pair and highlights it. Works until any pair is merged correctly. Sometimes even a match master needs a bit of advice!
- Shuffle. This power-up changes the positions of all tiles at once. It can be really useful when you're stuck and can't find a single pair. Mind games can be tricky, so don‚Äôt hesitate to use shuffle when you need it!
- Theme changer. Hard to connect blocks with those types of pictures on them? Use the changer! It swaps all the pictures on your tiles to make the tile connect easier. This effect fades off with the completion of the current level or any type of game exit.
- Wand. Use this power-up to match any tile with a bomb. Can save your level during the hottest scenarios. Unavailable if no bombs were spawned on the playing field.

Get ready for some fun!

We know how fun match games are. That's why we're creating the best matching games possible! Feel free to download our puzzle games and share them with your friends and relatives. Remember ‚Äì tiles connect players from all over the world!

Our free matching games are constantly improving. We hope that our tile games will bring something new for everyone. Stay connected to get the best brain-training experience with our vivid and modern logic games!

title: Solitaire Tripeaks Journey - Free Card Games
description:
Start your magical solitaire game with a lot of fun! Play free solitaire game after game, and relax your mind. 

Solitaire is a great way to stay sharp just like hearts, mahjong and word search. Mental sharpness is something that we all struggle with at the end of the day, so play solitaire free of charge. This solitaire app is not like the standard solitaire game. 

At Solitaire Tripeaks Journey, you will have a blast and get a chance to play solitaire with friends.

HOW TO PLAY
- Star/Level Chest: Collect stars to open the Star/Level chest to win abundant rewards.
- Undo: Tap "Undo" icon to try again, you can play the card you've missed.
- Combo Bonus: Additional bonuses will be awarded for continuous removing the cards.
- Wild Card: You can use the wild card to remove any cards you want to get rid of.
- Remove 3 Cards: After choosing this booster, you get rid of 3 cards in the beginning.

SPECIAL FEATURES
- 1000+ levels to play
- Lots of unique Solitaire card game layouts
- New fun solitaire game twists
- Complete your collection and boost your gameplay
- Easy to play yet challenging to master - let's see if you can win!?

Solitaire Tripeaks Journey is a free solitaire card game to download and free to play for everyone. But you can purchase in-app items, such as extra moves or lives.

title: Derby Stallion: Masters
description:
The Derby Stallion series has sold over 9 million copies!

What is Derby Stallion: Masters?
Derby Stallion: Masters is the latest game of the Derby Stallion series. It is a horse racing simulation game aiming at breeding the strongest horses. Players will be horse owners who breed, train racing, and arrange them to attend competitions and win big titles and prices. 

Players will experience the Japanese horse racing competitions and meet well-known horses from previous Derby Stallion games. Also, the game continues to provide the immersive game experience of previous series. The new game was designed for smartphones with a new UI, making it easier to play. Players now can easily enjoy the game with much faster loading times!

Game Features
EXPERIENCE THE REAL MANAGEMENT OF STUD-FARM - Forge your legacies in stud-farm to enhance its capabilities but it causes an increase of fixed expenditure. To balance the books, you need to arrange your horses to attend suitable matches depend on ability tendency to maximize profit of your stud-farm. 

JOURNEY TO THE RICH STORYLINE ABOUT DREAMS ‚Äì Follow the storyline, you will meet dozens of lovely friends. Finishing the branches of tasks, achievements to make the childhood dream come true. Start your journey to a fascinating story and have fun!

RACE WITH RIVALS AROUND THE WORLD - Register your best self-bred racing horse on Breeder Cup. Find and compete with worldwide rivals under the same racing environment. Winners will collect glorious achievements for your own stud-farm! 

PLAY FRIENDLY COMPETITIONS WITH YOUR FRIENDS - Race with your real-life friends in Derby Stallion: Masters by holding a friendly competition for your friends on Breeder Cup. Winning a friendly competition won‚Äôt bring you any rewards or achievements, so please just have fun with your friends! 


More changes from the original series
‚óÜ	This Game is friendly to beginner
Scripts and tutorials designed by Kozakiyusu will help beginners to go through horse breeding and attend races. Moreover, NPCs will give detailed instructions on facilities in the stud-farm. It is very accessible for beginners!

‚óÜ	Easy to use on smartphones
Add the skip function to the match makes it the fastest-paced game of the Derby Stallion series. The UI has been optimized for mobile devices, making it easier to breed and train horses.

‚óÜ	Almost a free game
Besides, the game has in-app purchase, players can freely play most of the game content. In addition, player could dominate the races without purchasing any extra resources. 

‚óÜ	Recommend the new game for such players
Fans of Derby Stallion games
AFK players of Derby Stallion series
Those who know the series but haven‚Äôt tried

Find out more by visiting our social media accounts:

Official Website: https://derbystallion.boltrend.com/en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DerbyStallionMasters
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DerbyStallionMasters/
Discord:  https://discord.gg/ZxPpEehfZg
descriptionHTML:
The Derby Stallion series has sold over 9 million copies!

What is Derby Stallion: Masters?
Derby Stallion: Masters is the latest game of the Derby Stallion series. It is a horse racing simulation game aiming at breeding the strongest horses. Players will be horse owners who breed, train racing, and arrange them to attend competitions and win big titles and prices.

Players will experience the Japanese horse racing competitions and meet well-known horses from previous Derby Stallion games. Also, the game continues to provide the immersive game experience of previous series. The new game was designed for smartphones with a new UI, making it easier to play. Players now can easily enjoy the game with much faster loading times!

Game Features
EXPERIENCE THE REAL MANAGEMENT OF STUD-FARM - Forge your legacies in stud-farm to enhance its capabilities but it causes an increase of fixed expenditure. To balance the books, you need to arrange your horses to attend suitable matches depend on ability tendency to maximize profit of your stud-farm.

JOURNEY TO THE RICH STORYLINE ABOUT DREAMS ‚Äì Follow the storyline, you will meet dozens of lovely friends. Finishing the branches of tasks, achievements to make the childhood dream come true. Start your journey to a fascinating story and have fun!

RACE WITH RIVALS AROUND THE WORLD - Register your best self-bred racing horse on Breeder Cup. Find and compete with worldwide rivals under the same racing environment. Winners will collect glorious achievements for your own stud-farm!

PLAY FRIENDLY COMPETITIONS WITH YOUR FRIENDS - Race with your real-life friends in Derby Stallion: Masters by holding a friendly competition for your friends on Breeder Cup. Winning a friendly competition won‚Äôt bring you any rewards or achievements, so please just have fun with your friends!


More changes from the original series
‚óÜ This Game is friendly to beginner
Scripts and tutorials designed by Kozakiyusu will help beginners to go through horse breeding and attend races. Moreover, NPCs will give detailed instructions on facilities in the stud-farm. It is very accessible for beginners!

‚óÜ Easy to use on smartphones
Add the skip function to the match makes it the fastest-paced game of the Derby Stallion series. The UI has been optimized for mobile devices, making it easier to breed and train horses.

‚óÜ Almost a free game
Besides, the game has in-app purchase, players can freely play most of the game content. In addition, player could dominate the races without purchasing any extra resources.

‚óÜ Recommend the new game for such players
Fans of Derby Stallion games
AFK players of Derby Stallion series
Those who know the series but haven‚Äôt tried

Find out more by visiting our social media accounts:

Official Website: https://derbystallion.boltrend.com/en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DerbyStallionMasters
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DerbyStallionMasters/
Discord: https://discord.gg/ZxPpEehfZg
summary: With more than 9 million copies sold, the Derby Stallion series comes to mobile
developerAddress: 1/F XIU PING COMM BLDG 104 JERVOIS ST SHEUNG WAN HONG KONG
recentChanges: The global release of Derby Stallion: Masters is live now!
comments: I'm in love with this game! finally a game that has no energy that has to refill, easy to understand, and no real need for in app purchases (its an option but not necessary) I do wish the horses looked better, the winner circle horses look more like horses. but its going off an anime kind of theme so makes sense. over all great game but horses look kinda odd
I would give it more stars, if I could actually download it. Best game ever, very different from the usually racing games. I love how you don't use energy but instead move by mouths/weeks.
Not easy to get into in the beginning, but so worth it!! Gameplay gets even deeper the more you advance, there is a lot to figure out and discover

Three star for now, coz of lots of loading time, each time you want to check your horse or go to facilities or even go to raffle, the app need to load something, with lead to "Failed to connect to the Server. Contact NO.1(-1)". Which each loading cause you around 3 minute wasted time. Really time wasting for a suppose to be fun game.
fun game allot to do like breed ya own horses and retire old horses can still be used to make ponys. 5 stars for quality and quantity :p

Welcome to the super retro world! 
Get ready for your unprecedented new experience!

[Pixel style+ Color Paint + Tap]
New and diverse combinations! Tap the screen to throw weapons, paint to complete your masterpiece. Enjoy the sense of accomplishment!
Various pixel models and boss levels with retro style. Upgrade your power to unlock more!

[Various weapons]
Carrots, pizza, darts, basketball, pistols, and more to be discovered.
Various weapons will bring you a super exciting visual experience.

[Rich Features]
Auto Tap: No need to move your fingers. Just wait and see all the paintings being drawn.

Partners: Create your dream team to complete the painting works.

Regeneration: Each life starts a new growth cycle. Each rebirth brings super rewards.

Costume: Beauty and intelligence must be equally important. Dress up yourself and your partners with the best outfit!

Treasure: Unlock the mysterious treasures and power-up for good.

developerAddress: Ocean Centre, Harbour City, 5 Canton Road, TST, KL, HK
comments: Its a different take on a idle/clicker game, the pixel art sprites are cute to complete but as you progress, some of the pictures are completed pretty fast sometimes. So far it all makes sense. Some of the mechanics and a little intrusive but there may be a way to turn that off, such as pointer fingers to show where something is. It runs pretty smoothly but i have some frame drops occasionally as the games speeds up, but i am on a s7 edge so its not new either. Its definitely worth a try, 4.5/5

I will actually delete the game if the constant nagging hand pointing at what I'm supposed to do isn't removed. It's fine at the beginning but it tells you what you're supposed to do on screen, I don't need a constant obnoxious reminder of it. Otherwise the game is fine but this is infuriating.

The game is very enjoyable and easy to understand, but the adds that are optional are often "broken" maybe? Whatever the case is when I watch the add there is no way to X out of it and claim my reward. I have to close the app and try again and I often ending up repeating that two or three times.

This game is basicaly an idle clicker. IMO it will be better if the main character doesn't equip a weapon like the helper. Watching his attack changes every 5 level upgrade is a good experience. Instead of killing monster, we are drawing picture, this is a nice concept.

The game is good but the upgrading is slow I would have loved an option to upgrade Max where depending on how much I have I can spend it on 50 levels of upgrades or more I also would have liked the prestige upgrades to make all the monsters harder depending on your characters total dps where if the total dps is 10k the monster should be 5x stronger

comments: Fun and addictive with a cute art style. But with the latest update my game is unplayable. Shows that my managers are being used even though there are none in the factory and nothing is being produced. Cannot progress in any way now. The factory also keeps getting reset every time I open the game.

A very cute and simple concept, as idle games go this one's as simple as it gets. You get managers to automate functions, sometimes level then up with peanuts, do small missions to progress to the next stage and repeat. I'm pretty sure it took me less than a week to reach the last stage (20) as it doesn't seem to progress form there, and it could go faster if I played all day long. If you're looking for a distraction on a car ride and between work, this games good for that. Needs more stages now

I love this game. The animation is adorable and the game play is very entertaining. The only problem I have is that while diamonds are so easy to get the peanuts are so hard to get. I have to watch about ten ads and I still don't have enough so then I have to sit around tapping every machine and then the level needed on the hamsters get higher. Please in the next update make them easier to get. Maybe increase the amount you get when you rank up a machine? Other then that im in love.

It's cute at first, then you hit the grind wall where to automate the machine you need to level up the hamster, which is fair enough, but then you get to the stage where you need a level 5 hamster to automate (which I assume is at least 150 peanuts, since 80 looks half way) , you end up not even being able to let the game idle, because you need to sit there clicking everything. Unless you watch the ads constantly to get 10 peanuts, even after that, you find out you need another hamster leveled

Very cute, and that's it. The pacing is horrible. I've been able to draw a dozen manager cards, but they were all the same card. Not to mention diamonds are in surplus but peanuts are nearly impossible to get, and the peanuts aren't even sold in high enough amounts to justify spending any amount of real money on them. I was barely able to make it to level 12, but it wasn't really worth it. Don't waste your time on this game

title: Love on the Edge: Otome Romance Game
description:
‚ñ†Synopsis‚ñ†

Orphaned at a young age, you were lucky enough to be taken in by the Faruta crime family and trained in the ways of assassination. But when your compassionate nature stops you from fulfilling your role, you‚Äôre suddenly no more than a liability to be traded away‚Ä¶ 

Your bleak future seems all but guaranteed when the Tanaka family steps in to make you one of their own. Soon, it becomes clear that this is no ordinary mafia organization hell-bent on domination at all costs, but a group with an entrenched moral code and a clear vision for a peaceful future.

Can you help them restore order to the chaotic criminal underworld, or will you once again find yourself falling short?

‚ñ†Characters‚ñ† 

Meet Hoshi Tanaka - The Boss

After the death of his father, Hoshi Tanaka finds himself at the head of the family. Already unusual for his young age, Hoshi also stands out due to his strong principles, going to great lengths to ensure the safety of his subordinates. 

Uninterested in immoral ventures and desperate to cement an honorable legacy for his family, Hoshi wants nothing more than to find a special someone to stand by his side‚Ä¶ 

Meet Kane Shibata - The Orphan

After losing his parents as a child, Kane was saved by the Tanaka family and soon became Hoshi‚Äôs most loyal lieutenant.

Cool and composed with an analytical mind, Kane is the logical foil to Hoshi‚Äôs passion. Even though he has the best intentions, he doesn‚Äôt always see the benefit of taking the more compassionate path, which can lead to fiery confrontations‚Ä¶ 

Meet Taiyo Seki - The Outsider

Caught up in a conflict outside his control, Taiyo is immediately relatable. 

The youngest of the three Tanaka leaders, with a playful heart and great admiration for his older brothers, Taiyo is indebted to the family and willing to protect it no matter the cost.

Impulsive, he prefers actions over words and has a wide array of connections in the underworld. Despite his easygoing nature, it‚Äôs impossible to miss how much the family means to him‚Äîespecially its newest member‚Ä¶
descriptionHTML:
‚ñ†Synopsis‚ñ†

Orphaned at a young age, you were lucky enough to be taken in by the Faruta crime family and trained in the ways of assassination. But when your compassionate nature stops you from fulfilling your role, you‚Äôre suddenly no more than a liability to be traded away‚Ä¶

Your bleak future seems all but guaranteed when the Tanaka family steps in to make you one of their own. Soon, it becomes clear that this is no ordinary mafia organization hell-bent on domination at all costs, but a group with an entrenched moral code and a clear vision for a peaceful future.

Can you help them restore order to the chaotic criminal underworld, or will you once again find yourself falling short?

‚ñ†Characters‚ñ†

After the death of his father, Hoshi Tanaka finds himself at the head of the family. Already unusual for his young age, Hoshi also stands out due to his strong principles, going to great lengths to ensure the safety of his subordinates.

Uninterested in immoral ventures and desperate to cement an honorable legacy for his family, Hoshi wants nothing more than to find a special someone to stand by his side‚Ä¶

Cool and composed with an analytical mind, Kane is the logical foil to Hoshi‚Äôs passion. Even though he has the best intentions, he doesn‚Äôt always see the benefit of taking the more compassionate path, which can lead to fiery confrontations‚Ä¶

Meet Taiyo Seki - The Outsider

Caught up in a conflict outside his control, Taiyo is immediately relatable.

The youngest of the three Tanaka leaders, with a playful heart and great admiration for his older brothers, Taiyo is indebted to the family and willing to protect it no matter the cost.

Impulsive, he prefers actions over words and has a wide array of connections in the underworld. Despite his easygoing nature, it‚Äôs impossible to miss how much the family means to him‚Äîespecially its newest member‚Ä¶

title: Shot Online: Golf Battle
description:
‚õ≥ Shot Online: Golf Battle is the ultimate free-to-play golf battle game, where you can challenge thousands of rival players around the world.
‚õ≥ Real-time (parallel) golf battle, with no need to wait for other golfers
‚õ≥ Quick matching, amazing golf courses, and extreme club effects!
‚õ≥ In our Survival Mode, challenge top golf players in a clash to become the king of the golf world!

‚≠ê Real-time (parallel) play: No need to waste time waiting for the opponent to take their shot!
Have you ever wasted your time in golf games waiting for players to take their shot? Now, in Shot Online: Golf Battle, you don‚Äôt have to wait anymore, as it is a real-time golf game. You will be quickly matched against the best golfers around the world at any time so that you can enjoy a parallel golf battle!

‚≠ê Show off your golfing skills to players around the world and become the golf king in our unique Survival Mode
Meet our unique match mode, Survival mode where you can play with 7 other players around the world. Each round will be held with different rules, but you are always welcome to use club skills. Since all the rounds will be elimination rounds, the last survivor gets the biggest and best prizes. With 8 players, the game gets more and more intense, and the different rules for each match will bring excitement to the competition.

‚≠ê Battle with your clanmates and become the best clan in Shot Online: Golf Battle!
You can make your own clan or join any clans you want in Shot Online: Golf Battle. If you have friends who are good golfers, try inviting them to your clan and clash other players to find out which clan is the best!

‚≠ê Switch your clubs like a pro depending on each of various types of courses in Shot Online: Golf Battle!
As you know, pro golfers switch their clubs depending on the course, using putter clubs, wood clubs, iron clubs etc. In our game, Shot Online: Golf Battle, you too can switch your clubs like a pro golfer! There are many types of courses available in the game. Upgrade or switch your club skills as you go through the various types of courses in Shot Online: Golf Battle. You can switch your clubs to help you face different obstacles. Each club skill has different uses in the game; however, you can only use skills once per match. Therefore, you must choose wisely when using skills in the game.

‚≠ê New tours will open on your way to becoming a golf king.
Unlock tours as you master control skills in the game. New tours will be open when you reach a certain number of trophies in the game. As the tour levels go up, you will be able to experience different types of golf courses in the game.

‚≠ê Get plenty of prizes without paying just by being a good golfer in the game!
Win prizes from your plays and unlock many types of clubs and balls that will help improve your playing. By playing 1v1 games, you can get cases and coins as winning prizes. Inside the cases, there will be coins, gems, club cards that you can use to upgrade your clubs. As you upgrade or get new types of clubs, you will be able to use new skills which improve the quality of your play.

‚≠ê Experience golf courses with stunning 3D graphics!
You will have a spectacular golf game experience with our realistic in-game graphics. A variety of club designs and skills with awesome visual effects will give you the best golf game experience ever!

Shot Online: Golf Battle is a mobile golf game developed by Onnet, celebrating the 17th anniversary of Shot Online in 2021.

A network connection is required to play this game.
Like Shot Online: Golf Battle on Facebook for news and updates!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ShotOnlineGolfBattle
Support: SOGB_help@webzen.com

Terms: https://www.webzen.com/Legal/TermsOfService-Mobile
Privacy: https://www.webzen.com/Legal/PrivacyPolicy-Mobile

comments: I enjoyed the original shot online, and this game has promise. Unfortunately, everything in the game requires massive amounts of gold to the point if you get on a losing streak you're pretty much stuck buying gold. If you choose not to buy gold, you can't play the higher tier matches to progress and get stuck playing rounds for pocket change to try to get enough gold to play a higher tier match. Rewards offer next to no gold compared to the cost of playing. Pretty disappointed.

Went into this thinking it would be no different than the other lame golf games, Golf Rival, Golf Legends, Golf Impact, etc...I was correct...same old wait forever to open cases, same old pull to swing, same old match up with bots. However, the mechanics are well done, good graphics, and like that you play simultaneously. But come on guys, can we think of something new? These types of golf games are terribly old at this point. Where is the originality? Sorry, but you can do better.

It needs a practice course just to practice around and also the wind on it , isn't really accurate and reason I say that is like if the flag is blowing southeast at 2.5 mph and u adjust to that to hit like in other golf games ,but when u do it in this game it still pushes u way further than what it should and another thing is in golf bags u should up the gold coins given a little that will help out ones that's getting use to the game and isn't winning many games , instead of having to buy coins

To much bulls**it when playing this game. Like when its at a spot where it can be " played where it lies". Instead i get an OB on it. That costs a stroke. Needs to be fixed. Other than that this game is really good

So far enjoying the game some things i would change since you have to open Chests to get clan points is fine but more gems need to be giving. Id like to see tourments as well as give a player a chance to play again not just one game.

title: Monopolize - Classic board games online free
description:
Enjoy one of the most classic board games of history: Monopolize, available totally free now for Android devices.

Since decades ago this has been one of the most played board games, you can play with family or friends, or against player around the world. You can play with 2 to 4 players, and now you can enjoy this classic game on mobile devices.

How works "Monopolize"
In this game you must expand your control over the city, expand your business and buy all the real estate you can. Throw the dice, buy and build houses and hotels, trade with other players. Try to earn as much money as you can and defeat your opponents, you have to had the monopoly of the buildings!

How to play this board game
Throw your dice, move around the board and try to buy as many properties as you can. When you get a color set you'll be able to start building houses and hotels, and the players will pay you a huge rent for them! Try to ruin your enemies and become the master of the city. Remember, this is a business game, your economy is the most important thing, so have no mercy on your enemies and ruin them!

Available content on "Monopolize"
- Funny and friendly 3D cities. Try to unlock all of them! New York, Paris...
- Dozens of avatars
- Exclusive pawns to move around the board
- Different color sets to configure the game as you want
- Addictive and funny casino games where you'll earn fantastic prizes. Enjoy our casino
- Multiplayer online game mode. Thousand of players waiting for you, from 2 to 4 players, the funniest game you'll find
- Offline mode to play whenever and wherever you want. This is a solitarie mode, so if you like to play alone, you'll love it!

Who can play this board game
This game is recommended for player from 12 years or more. You can play with family, or also you can play with friends, but one of the most funny game mode is to play against anonymous players online, trying to become the best monopolist of the world. Grow up your business, control the city,  beat the casino, definitely, become the master of the "Monopolize" having the buildings monopoly of the city.

What I'll find on the board
- 4 different stations
- 22 streets, grouped by color. You have to control the entire set of a color to start building houses and hotels on this streets
- 2 public services: Company of lighting and company of water. If you control both, you'll earn higher comissions
- 2 community positions. If you stop on this slot, you'll receive a community card with an uknown content. This can be very possitive... Or dangerous!
- 2 surprise positions. As the community slots... You can earn something very good... Or not!
- 2 "pay tax" positions. Try to avoid them! As a good capitalist, you love your money

Changes made to play fast games
Maybe you'll think this game is slow to play on smartphones, but forget it! We have made this game really dynamic. Each player has a maximum time by turn, and all the transactions are made automatically, so you dont have to count your money nor change them with other players. This process is really fast and comfortable. You'll find also you can trade with other players very fastly, with 3 simple taps.

Dont wait more and try totally free one of the biggest classic board games of all times. Enjoy with friends or family, manage smartly your capital, take advantage of the casino and earn tons of prizes. Unlock all the content and show to everyone that you can become the master of the "Monopolize"

comments: After playing for a little while i started realizing that the CPU players almost never land on your spaces. Infact, theyl almost always conviently land 1 space shy of your property, and you will almost always land on theres. even on easy mode. Starting to not like this game. no matter how many times i restart, i see the same pattern, CPU cheats. I dont think it was done intentionally, i think the algorithm is probably buggy. Thats all. Other than that, it is awesome.

Awesome guys, keep working hard. Is not perfect but it is really funny. This monopoly would be much funnier if you add an option to play with friends

title: Idle Plane Crash Survival
description:
A plane is crashed on an uninhabited island. 
Look how the people are trying to survive.
Send them to collect the resources and tell them what to craft next.
Build enough boats for them to leave the island.
